SA15n1234:9: sādhyadharmmasya śrutatvāt tasyaiva svabhāva iti gamyate |
SA15n1234:11: yāvatā bhedena pratīyata ityata āha-“aparasmādaparasmācca” asato'kṣaṇikācca yā “vyāvṛtti”stasyā yo “bhedaḥ” avadhibhedopakalpitastena hetubhūtena “sādhyadharmmāt sādhanadharmmasya” yo “bheda”stasmin “satyapi“ “vastutaḥ” paramārthato “liṅgasvabhāva eva” sādhyadharmmasvabhāva eva |
SA15n1234:12: tathā hi- ya evāsato vyāvṛttaḥ sa evākṣaṇikādapi |
SA15n1234:13: tata ekasmād dharmmiṇo bhedābhāvāt sādhyasādhanadharmmāvapi paramārthato naiva bhidyete iti |
SA15n1234:17: yo hi yasya svabhāvaḥ sa kathaṃ tanmātrānvayī na syāt ?
SA15n1234:18: , nīrūpatvaprasaṅgādatatsvabhāvatā vā ityata āha-hetuḥ svabhāvo yasya sādhyadharmmasya tasmin “hetusvabhāve” “sādhyadharmme” sati “anvayavyabhicārābhāvāt” sādhanadharmmabhāvamātrasya yo'nvayastasya vyabhicārābhāvāt |
SA15n1234:20: atra tu sambhava eva na vyabhicāra iti “viśeṣaṇamayuktameva |
SA15n1234:21: tathāpi” svabhavahetulakṣaṇe kriyamāṇe yadetat “sādhyadharmmasya” “tanmātrānvayena” sādhanadharmmabhāvamātrānugamanena viśeṣaṇaṃ “tat paramatāpekṣaṃ” naiyāyikādīnāṃ vipratipattestanmatāpekṣaṃ na tu svamatāpekṣam |
SA15n1234:22: tāmeva paravipratipattiṃ darśayannāha- “pare hi” naiyāyikādayaḥ “arthāntaranimittaḥ” janakādarthādanyo yo'rtho vegavaddravyayogādiḥ tannimittam |
SA15n1234:27: tata eva “arthāntaranimittapekṣamāṇaṃ” kṛtakatvādibhāve'pyabhāvād “atabhdāvamātrānvayinaṃ” tasya kṛtakatvādeḥ bhāvaḥ sattā saiva tanmātraṃ tasyānvayaḥ sa yasyāsti sādhyadharmmasya anityatvalakṣaṇasya tadviparītam “api” kṛtakatvādeḥ “svabhāvamicchanti” yataḥ tato viśeṣaṇaṃ kṛtam |
SA15n1234:28: tena ca viśeṣaṇena tathāvidhasyārthāntaranimittasya vināśasyātatsvabhāvatāmāha lakṣaṇe viśeṣaṇakāraḥ |
SA15n1234:31: tathā, “tasmin” arthāntaranimitte sādhye “hetoḥ” kṛtakatvādeḥ vyabhicāramanaikāntikatāṃ cāha |
SA15n1234:32: atrodāharaṇaṃ “yathā hetumati vināśe” sādhye “kṛtakatvasya” hetoḥ “atatsvabhāvatā vyabhicāraśceti” |
SA15n1234:33: nanu ca kṛtakatvasvabhāvatā anityatāyā bhedopagamāt neṣṭaiva paraistat kimucyate- “atabhdāvamātrānvayinamapi svabhāvamicchanti” iti ? |
SA15n1234:34: evaṃ manyate- vyatiriktāvapi kṛtakatvānityatvākhyau dharmmāvabhyupagacchabhdiravaśyam ‘abhūtvā bhavanaṃ bhūtvā cābhavanamanavasthāyisvabhāvatvam’ abhyupagantavyam,
SA15n1234:36: tato yadeva‘abhūtvā bhavanaṃ bhūtvā ['bhavanaṃ] cānavasthāyitvam’ upādīyate bhāvasya tayoreva taddarśanabalotpannakṛtakatvāniyatvabhedāvabhāsikalpanādvāreṇa sādhyasādhanabhāvo'stu,
SA15n1234:38: kalpayitvā'pi vastvātmana evārthakriyānibandhanatayā tadarthibhiḥ cintyatvāt | taduktam-
SA15n1234:44: iti | tasmād dṛṣṭā api bhāvāḥ kenacidātmanā tadanyavyāvṛttena kathañcinniścitāḥ tadanyenāpyatadrūpavyāvṛttenātmanā bhrāntikāraṇasabhdāvādaniścīyamānāḥ,
SA15n1234:45: niścitāniścitayo rūpayoḥ pramāṇāntarataḥ pratibandhāvasāyāpurovarttino'numānato niścīyate iti anityatāsvabhāvabhūtasyaiva kṛtakatvasya vināśaṃ prati liṅgatā yuktā |
SA15n1234:46: tathā ca vināśasvabhāva eva kṛtakatvākhyo hetuḥ tairyathoktanyāyādiṣṭo bhavati |
SA15n1234:48: syānmatam-kṛtakatvena sākṣad hetumān vināśo'numīyate tataḥ prākpradhvaṃsābhavaviśeṣaṇā sattā tatsamavāyo vā'nityatā vyavasthāpyate |
SA15n1234:50: vināśa iti ca na bhāvābhāvaṃ pradhvaṃsalakṣaṇaṃ manyāmahe |
SA15n1234:59: sukhaduḥsvasādhane jñātvā yathārhaṃ pratipitsavo hi kiñcit parīkṣante na vyasanitayā |
SA15n1234:62: anyathā bhāvāvilakṣaṇasya pradhvaṃsābhāvasya mugdarāderudaye'pi tasya bhāve'nupayogāt sa bhāvastadavastha eveti kathaṃ tadviśeṣaṇā sattā tatsamavāyo vā anityatā syāt? |
SA15n1234:63: avicalitarūpasya ca bhāvasya mugdarādikṛtapradhvaṃsābhāvaviśeṣaṇau sattāsamavāyau yadyanityatā,
SA15n1234:67: abhūtvā bhavata eva ca yā sattā saiva kṛtakatvaṃ varṇyate |
SA15n1234:69: abhūtvā bhavanopagame ca tadeva kṛtakatvamasthirasvabhāvatā ca vināśo'stu |
SA15n1234:75: tathā hi-ye yatra hetvantarāpekṣiṇo na te tatrāvaśyambhāvinaḥ,
SA15n1234:77: hetvantarāpekṣī ca kṛtakeṣvapi bhāveṣu pradhvaṃsābhāva iti viruddhavyāptopalabdhiḥ |
SA15n1234:78: nanu vāsasi rāgasya parimitahetutvāt tasya ca svakāraṇāyattasannidhānatvāt tadāśrayasya ca vidhurapratyayopanipātenāsthiratayā nāvaśyambhavitā yuktaiva |
SA15n1234:81: na ca vināśasyāśrayaṃ prāk taddhetusannidheḥ kecidupaghnānti,
SA15n1234:84: yato yadyapi bahulaṃ vināśakāraṇāni santi tathāpi teṣāṃ svakaraṇāyattasannidhitvāt tathā tatkāraṇānāṃ ca sa nnihitānāmapi virodhināmapyānatyāt tabhdāve tacchaktipratibandhānnāvaśyaṃ hetavaḥ phalavanta iti kaścinna vinaśyedapīti vyabhicāro na nivartate |
SA15n1234:85: nanvayaṃ vāsasi rāgaḥ sāpekṣo'pi yadi sarvvatropalabhyeta tataḥ kimavaśyambhāvī na syāt ? |
SA15n1234:88: yadyevaṃ na tarhi sarvvatropalabdhasya vināśasyānyathābhāvaśaṅkayā manasi kheda ādhātavyaḥ |
SA15n1234:92: kasyacit tu hetukṛtavināśadarśane'pi hetvāyattajanmanamanyathā'pi darśanād upajātāśaṅko deśakālasvabhāvaviprakṛṣṭeṣu kathaṃ tathābhāvaṃ niścinvīta ? |
SA15n1234:95: na cāsya ghaṭāderiva vināśaheturupalabhyate kaściditi | taduktam-
SA15n1234:98: iti | tataḥ kṛtakatva vināśe sādhye tenaiva vyabhicāraḥ kiṃ neṣyate ? |
SA15n1234:104: tasyānumānenopalambhāditi yadyucyeta tadā tatrāpyanumāne vipakṣe vṛttimanupalambha eva hetoḥ kathaṃ nivarttayati ?
SA15n1234:106: tasmāt sādhūktam- ‘ hetumati vināśe kṛtakatvasyāsvabhāvatāṃ vyabhicāraṃ cāha’ iti alamatijalpiteneti |
SA15n1234:108: idānīṃ yadyapi svārthānumānaṃ prakṛtaṃ tathāpi kaścit prayogadarśanābhyāsāt prayogabhaṅgayaiva pratipadyata iti svārthanumāne'pi tatsvambhavāt prasaṅgena parārthānumānaṃ ca vyutpādayitumāha-‘tasya” svabhāvahetoḥ “dvidhā” trailakṣaṇyapratipādako vacanodāhāraḥ “prayogaḥ” |
SA15n1234:109: tameva darśayati-samāno dharmmo yasya tasya bhāvaḥ tena “sādhya(dha)
SA15n1234:111: “aparo” visadṛśo dharmmo yasya tasya bhāvaḥ tena “vaidharmyeṇa” |
SA15n1234:117: yasya sattvakṣaṇikatvayoḥ pratibandhaprasādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ ghaṭādau pravṛttaṃ taṃ prati tatra smṛtisamādhānārthaṃ dṛṣṭāntavacanaṃ na sādhyasiddhyartham |
SA15n1234:119: na hyekasya tathā bhāve sarvvastathā bhavati,
SA15n1234:125: atrāpi sarvvagrahaṇaṃ vibhaktivipariṇāmena sambandhanīyam “kṣaṇikatvābhāve” sarvvasmin “sattvā(ttvā)bhāvaḥ” iti |
SA15n1234:126: prayogadvaye'pi sarvvagrahaṇasya phalaṃ darśayannāha- “sarvvasmin sādhanadharmavati” dharmmiṇi na dṛṣṭāntadharmmiṇyeva “sādhyadharmmasyo” pasaṃharaṇaṃ “upasaṃhāro” ḍhaukanaṃ tena yā “vyāptiḥ” ‘vyāpakasya tatra bhāva eva’ ityādirūpā tasyāḥ pradarśanaṃ pratipādanaṃ tadeva “lakṣaṇaṃ” yayoḥ tau tathoktau |
SA15n1234:127: tataśca ye sādhyadharmmiṇaṃ parihṛtya bahirvyāptiṃ pradarśayanti te- yadyapi dṛṣṭāntadharmmiṇi sādhyadharmmeṇa sādhanadharmmo vyāptaḥ tāvatā'sya sarvvatra tathābhāvābhāvāt sādhyasiddhirayukteti- nirastā bhavanti |
SA15n1234:128: sarvvatra vā sādhyadharmmeṇa sādhanadharmmasya vyāptiḥ tabhdāve,
SA15n1234:129: sā tathāvidhaiva kinna pradarśyate yenāsamarthā bahirvyāptirākhyāyate ? |
SA15n1234:132: paridṛśyamānaputravad’ iti tatputratvasya śyāmatvena sādhyād bahiḥ paridṛśyamānaputre vyāptipradarśane'pi sādhyasiddhirbhavati |
SA15n1234:133: tasmād yaiva sarvvopasaṃhāreṇa vyāptiḥ pramāṇasiddhapratibandhanibandhanā sādhyasiddhau samarthā saiva tatsmṛtaye pradarśanīyā |
SA15n1234:134: na ca sarvvopasaṃhāreṇa vyāptipradarśane'pi dharmmaviśiṣṭo dharmyapi tadaiva pratīyate,
SA15n1234:137: tatpūrvvikāyāṃ ca vyāptau anantaraṃ viśeṣaviṣayamanumānaṃ kathaṃ smṛtiḥ syāt ? iti |
SA15n1234:142: tatra hi kevalaṃ sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvaḥ kathyate,
SA15n1234:143: na tu hetau sati sādhyasya bhāva eveti |
SA15n1234:150: kintu nivṛttau nivṛttidharmmakatvaṃ svagato dharmma upadarśyate vaidharmyaprayogeṇa,
SA15n1234:151: tathāvidhe ca sādhanadharmme'vaśyaṃtayā sādhyadharmmasya bhāvaḥ pratīyata eva,
SA15n1234:152: anyathā tannivṛttau nivṛttidharmmakatvasyaivāyogāditi na vyāptipradarśanalakṣaṇatvaṃ vaidharmyaprayogasya na yujyate |
SA15n1234:154: nanu dvividhe'pi prayoge pratijñāprayogo nopadarśitaḥ tat kathaṃ tadarthāvagatiḥ ?
SA15n1234:155: , tadarthapratyāyanāya ca sādhanaprayogo'bhimataḥ ityata āha- “atra” anayoḥ prayogayoḥ “pakṣadharmmasambandhavacanamātrasāmarthyādeva” vakṣyamāṇakāt “pratijñārthasya” dharmmadharmmisamudāyalakṣaṇasya sādhyasya “pratīteḥ” hetoḥ “na” “pratījñāyāḥ prayoga upadarśitaḥ” |
SA15n1234:156: paraḥ sāmarthyamanavavudhyamāna āha- “apradarśite” vacanena “prameye” sādhye “kathaṃ” na kathañcit “tatpratītiḥ” pratijñārthapratītiḥ “iti” evaṃ “ced” yadi manyase tadā svārthānumānakāle “svayaṃ” paraṃ pratipādakamantareṇa “pratipattau” prameyasya “ka upadarśayitā” ?
SA15n1234:158: svayameva tu sādhyavinābhūtasādhanadharmmadarśanāt prameyaṃ pratipadyate tatha parārthānumāne'pi tata eva tatpratītirastu kiṃ pratijñāvacanena ? |
SA15n1234:159: yadi svayaṃpratipattikāle na kaścit prameyasyopadarśayitā kathaṃ tarhi tatpratipattiḥ ?
SA15n1234:160: ityata āha- “pradeśasthaṃ” sādhyadharmmiṇi sthitaṃ “dhūmaṃ” sādhanadharmmaṃ “upalabdhavataḥ” pratyakṣeṇa dṛṣṭavataḥ sataḥ “tasya” dhūmasya “agninā” sādhyadharmmeṇa pramāṇataḥ pratibandhaniścayabalāt prākpratipannāyāḥ “vyāpteḥ” avinābhāvasya “smaraṇe” sati “tatsāmarthyādeva” pakṣadharmmagrahaṇavyāptigrahaṇasāmarthyādeva pratijñāprayogarahitād “agniratra iti” evaṃrūpā “pratijñārthapratītirbhavati” |
SA15n1234:161: syānmatam-tatrāpyasya karṇṇapiśācikādiḥ prameyaṃ kathayatyevetyata āha-“na ca” naiva “tatra” svārthanumānakāle “kaścit” karṇṇapiśācikadiradṛśyo “‘agniratra’- iti” evam “asmai” pratipatre(tre)
SA15n1234:164: tathā hi-vayamapi pradeśasthadhūmadarśanāt tasyāgninā vyāptismaraṇasāpekṣādagniṃ pratipadyāmahe |
SA15n1234:168: yadyapi na kaścit nivedayati tathāpi svayameva prameyaṃ vyavasthāpya tatpratipattaye liṅgamanusariṣyatīti cet,
SA15n1234:169: āha- “nāpi” na kevalaṃ na kaścit nivedayati “svayamapi prāgeva” liṅgavyāpārāt na pratipadyate “kiñcid” agnyādikam |
SA15n1234:174: atha liṅgamantareṇāpyevaṃ pratītirbhavatiti brūyāt tadā pratītāviṣyamāṇāyāṃ liṅgasya vaiyarthyam,
SA15n1234:176: tena vinā tatpratipattau kathamasya niṣprayojanatā na syāt ? |
SA15n1234:177: atyantamūḍhatāṃ ca parasya darśayannāha- “svayameva” svatantra eva ‘agniratra’-iti vyavasthāpya |
SA15n1234:179: “akasmāt” pramāṇamantareṇa vyavasthāpanāt “tatpratipattaye” nirnnimittavyavasthāpitaprameyapratipattyarthaṃ “paścāt” “liṅgaṃ” tannimittam “anusaratīti ko'yaṃ pratipatteḥ kramaḥ ” paripāṭiḥ ? |
SA15n1234:183: yattalloke gīyate-śīro muṇḍayitvā nakṣatraṃ pṛcchatīti tattulyatvādasya kramasya |
SA15n1234:185: tacca pratipādakaṃ kathitemaveti na kiñcit prameyanirddeśena |
SA15n1234:186: yadi nāma svārthānumānakāle svayameva sādhyaṃ pratipadyate tad yuktameva,
SA15n1234:188: parārthānumāne tu parato yathā liṅgaṃ pratyeti tathā prameyamapi parata eva pratyetavyam |
SA15n1234:189: ato yukta eva pratijñāprayoga ityata āha-“pareṇāpi” na kevalaṃ svayameva prāg vyavasthāpyamānaṃ plavate pareṇāpi vādinā “tat“ prameyam “ucyamānaṃ plavat eva” tadvacanasya sandigdhārthabhidhāyakatayā sādhyaniścayānaṅgatvāt prameyagāmbhīryānavāgāhinaḥ paramparayā'pyatatsambaddhasya vivakṣāmātranibandhanatayoparyevāvasthāpanāt |
SA15n1234:191: iti cet, “upayogābhāvāt ” nāsya sādhyapratītiṃ prati kaścidupayogaḥ,
SA15n1234:193: parastūpayogamātraṃ kadācid brūyād ityāśaṅkayāha- “viṣayopadarśanaṃ” hetoryo viṣayaḥ sādhyaṃ tadupadarśanaṃ pratijñāvacanasyopayogaḥ “cet matam” |
SA15n1234:200: tathā hi-asati sādhyanirdeśe ‘yat kṛtakaṃ tadanityam’ ityukte ‘kimayaṃ sādharmyavāna prayogaḥ ?
SA15n1234:205: ‘anityaḥ śabdaḥ’ ‘akṛtako vā’ iti tu pratijñāvacane satyubhayamasandigdhamavagamyate |
SA15n1234:214: sati pratijñāvacane avayave samudāyopacārāt sādhyadharmmī pakṣa iti tatra vṛttasya kṛtakatvasya pakṣadharmmatvaṃ;
SA15n1234:215: sādhyadharmmasāmānyena ca samāno'rthaḥ sapakṣa iti tatra varttamānasya sapakṣe sattvam;
SA15n1234:216: na sapakṣo'sapakṣa iti sādhyadharmmavirahiṇyavṛttasyāsapakṣe'pyasattvaṃ pratīyeta ityāśaṅkayāha- “yadi pratīti” sādhyasya niścayalakṣaṇā sādharmmyavatprayogādeśca svarūpāvadhāraṇātmikā |
SA15n1234:217: “anyathā” pratijñāvacanamantareṇa “na syāt tadā” yaduktaṃ sādhyasidhyarthaṃ sādharmyavatprayogādijñānārthaṃ ca viṣayopadarśanam iti tat “sarvvaṃ śobheta” yāvatā svarthānumānakāle pratijñāvacanamantareṇāpi pakṣadharmmagrahaṇa sambandhasmaraṇataḥ sādhyasiddhilakṣaṇā bhavatyeva pratītiḥ ityākhyātameva |
SA15n1234:219: yata evaṃ “tasmāt” “eṣa” pratijñāprayogavādī yadā svayaṃ sādhyaṃ pratyeti tadā svayaṃ sādhyasya “pratītau” viṣaya upasthāpyate yena pratijñāvacanadvāreṇa puṃsā “kenacit” tena “vināpi” “pratiyan” sādhyaṃ niścinvan liṅgasāmarthyadeva |
SA15n1234:220: yadā'smābhiḥ pratipādyate tadā “asmān kāryiṇo dṛṣṭvā vyaktaṃ” pratijñāprayogalakṣaṇaṃ “mūlyaṃ mṛgayate” |
SA15n1234:222: yathā dakṣiṇāmantareṇāpyanyadā aurdhvarathiko brāhmaṇo bhuñjāno'nyadā śrāddhādiparvvaṇyarthinaṃ śraddhāluṃ bravīti-yadi me ghṛtapūraṃ ghṛtapūraṃ prati rūpakaṃ dadāsi tato'haṃ bhuñje nānyatheti |
SA15n1234:224: kiñca, yadapi bravīṣi-parārthānumānakāle yathā liṅgaṃ pareṇānabhidhīyamānaṃ na pratyeti pratipādyastathā sādhyamapīti |
SA15n1234:225: tadaitad yujyate yadyasau vādivacanamātreṇa liṅgamapi niścitya tadanusāreṇa sādhyamavagacchet,
SA15n1234:226: parapratītyarthinaśca tadā vayamapi pratijñāṃ kinna prayuñjmahe liṅgavacanarahitām ? |
SA15n1234:231: yataḥ “asmadvacanādapi” na kevalaṃ svārthānumānakāle asmadvacanamantareṇa ityapiśabdaḥ |
SA15n1234:232: kintu yadāpyasmadvacanaṃ pravṛttaṃ tadāpi “naiva” asmadvacanāt “liṅgamapi pratyeti” kuta eva sādhyasiddhye'nusariṣyati ? |
SA15n1234:233: api tu svayamasya yadi talliṅgaṃ kutaścit pramāṇataḥ siddhaṃ bhavati “asmadvacanena tu” kevalaṃ tatra “smṛtisamādhānamātraṃ kriyate” |
SA15n1234:234: tadā svayaṃ siddhameva liṅgamanusṛtya sādhyaṃ pratyeti |
SA15n1234:239: tataḥ sādhyapratītiṃ ca prati viśeṣābhāvāt pratijñopanyāsaḥ parārthānumāne'pi vyartha eva |
SA15n1234:240: liṅgamapi hi tāvadatra nābhidhīyate yadi tat pūrvvaprasiddhaṃ svayamanusmaret kimaṅga punaḥ sandigdhārthābhidhāyakaṃ pratijñāvacanamupādīyate ? |
SA15n1234:241: syānmatam-yadi nāma sādhyasiddhau pratijñāvacanasya nopayogastadartho'sya prayogo mā bhūta,
SA15n1234:243: tasyānyathā pratītyabhāvāt ityata āha- “dṛṣṭā ca sādharmyavatprayogādeḥ pratijñāvacanamantarenāpi pratītiḥ,
SA15n1234:247: evaṃ manyate- naiva hi kaścit ‘yat kṛtakaṃ tadanityam” etāvanmātramabhidhīyā''ste,
SA15n1234:250: tatra yadi ‘kṛtakaśca śabdaḥ’ iti brūyāt tadā sādhya(dha)
SA15n1234:252: atha ‘nityaśca’ ityabhidadhyāt tadā vaidharmyavata iti sambandhavacanapūrvvakāt pakṣadharmmavacanāt prayogadvayāvagatiḥ |
SA15n1234:254: yadā tu sambandhavacanamapi kriyate tadā kathamapratītiḥ? |

SA15n1234:577: tathā hi-agnyādīnāmanyakriyāyāṃ caritārthatvādanivṛttā eva tebhyaḥ indhanādayaḥ prāgvadupalabhyeran |
SA15n1234:596: nahi bhāvaśūnyatāṃ vihāyāparaṃ tatra kiñcid rūpamīkṣāmahe |
SA15n1234:598: tasmādagnyādisaṃyogakāle “na tasya kiñcid bhavati na bhavatyeva kevala” mityevopagantu yuktam |
SA15n1234:599: yato nāyaṃ kasyacid bhāvena naṣṭo nāma kintu yataḥ svayamasthirarūpatayā bhūtastato naṣṭo nāma |
SA15n1234:601: tathā ca bhavanadharmmaṇaḥ kasyacidabhāvād bhāvaṃ bhavantaṃ kutaścinna karotīti kriyāpratiṣedha evāgnisaṃyogādeḥ syāt |
SA15n1234:602: “evaṃ ca” sati “karttā” agnisaṃyogādiḥ “na bhavati ityakarturahetutvamiti” tasmā “nna vināśahetuḥ kaścit |”
SA15n1234:605: kintu “vaiyarthyācca” tadevāha- “yadi svabhāvato naśvaro” naśanaśīlaḥ svātma“nyanavasthāyī” sthātumaśakto yathā sūcyagre sarṣapaḥ “tasya na kiñcinnāśakāraṇaiḥ” |
SA15n1234:609: nahi prakṛtyaiva sthātumaśakte sūcyagre sarṣape tadasthitaye prayāsaḥ phalavān bhavet |
SA15n1234:613: tadātmatāyā hetvantarānapekṣaṇena vyāptiṃ tādātmyasādhakena pramāṇena darśayati- “tadātmano” yo yasya svabhāvaḥ tatsvabhāvasya “tādātmyābhāve” hetvantaramapekṣamāṇasya svahetornniṣpannasyāpi tatsvabhāvatvābhāve “nairātmyasya” niḥsvabhāvatāyāḥ prasaṅgāt |
SA15n1234:614: “tadvat” prakāśādivat “na punaḥ” paścāt “tadātmatāyāṃ” asthitidharmmātmatāyāṃ “hetvantaramapekṣata” iti pramāṇaphalam |
SA15n1234:622: “syādetat” ityādinā etadeva vibhajate “kevalā na janayanti” iti |
SA15n1234:626: “tadvad bhāvo'pī”ndhanādiḥ svahetornnaśvarātmā niṣpanno'pi “vināśe” vinaśvarātmatāyāṃ syāditi dārṣṭāntikam |
SA15n1234:630: yaśca kṣityādīkamapekṣamāṇo na janayati kuśūlādyavasthaḥ tasya “ajanakasya ca atatsvabhāvatvāt” aṅkurādijananasvabhāvatvābhāvāt |
SA15n1234:631: tatra tadātmatālakṣaṇo hetuḥ na vartata eveti na tenānekāntaḥ |
SA15n1234:640: yatastadviṣayasya bhedasiddhyā bādhāmanubhavadapramāṇametat syāt ityāśaṅkayāha-‘ata eva’ janakatvājanakatvādeva viruddhadharmmādhyāsāt ‘tayoravasthayoḥ’ janakājanakāvasthayoḥ bījādeḥ “vastubhedaḥ” svabhāvabhedo “niśceyaḥ”adhyavasātavyaḥ |
SA15n1234:641: yathā hi śālibījaṃ tadaṅkurajananasvabhāvaṃ tabhdāve śālyaṅkurabhāvadarśanāt pratyakṣato'vagamyate,
SA15n1234:642: yavabījaṃ cātajjananasvabhāvam tabhdāve śālyaṅkurānupalabdhyā tadviviktayavabījagrāhipratyakṣarūpayā pratīyate tathā'trāpyavasthādvaye śālibījasya tadaṅkuraviviktāviviktāvasthāgrāhipratyakṣabalādeva svāṅkurajanakājanakasvabhāvatā kinna niścīyate ? |
SA15n1234:646: na hi yadanātmarūpavivekena svajñāne na pratibhāsane tasya pratyakṣatā yuktā |
SA15n1234:647: avasthā tadvatoḥ svabhāvabhedābhāvāt kathaṃ rūpāntareṇa pratibhāsanam ? iti cet |
SA15n1234:650: avasthābhede'pyabhinnarūpasya tathā vyavasthānāt kathañcibhdedasyāpi bhāvādadoṣa iti cet |
SA15n1234:652: avasthāścemāḥ’ iti bhaṇyate tenāvasthātadvatorbhedastadā bheda eveti ‘kathañcit’ ityandhapadametat |
SA15n1234:653: tato'sya pratyakṣatāyāṃ anātmarūpavivekinā rūpāntareṇāvabhāsanaprasaṅgo na nivarttate |
SA15n1234:666: tāścāvasthā janakājanakasvabhāvabhedavatyaḥ pratyakṣata evāvagamyanta iti tadekatvādhyavasāyi pratyabhijñānaṃ tabdādhāmanubhavat kathaṃ pramāṇaṃ syāt ?
SA15n1234:667: , yato bījādināmaṅkurādijananasvabhāvānāmapi tadātmatāyāṃ hetvantarāpekṣaṇāt prāktanasya hetoranaikāntikatā bhavet |
SA15n1234:670: tathā hi- “tayoḥ” janakājanakāvasthayoriti saptamīdvivacanametat tadā bhavati |
SA15n1234:671: tadayamartho-janakāvasthāyāmajanakāvasthāyāṃ ca “vastunaḥ” dharmmilakṣaṇasya “bhedaḥ” svabhāvanānātvam “ata eva” janakājanakasvabhāvatvādeva pratyakṣāvasitāt “niśceyaḥ” niścayalakṣaṇastatra vyavahāraḥ kartavyaḥ,
SA15n1234:673: na ca śākyate vaktum-avasthā evāṅkurādijananasvabhāvā nāvasthātā iti |
SA15n1234:675: tato yad ekarūpatayā pratyabhijñānaṃ bhāveṣu tat pūrvvottarakālayorjanakājanakasvabhāvabhedavyavasthāpakapratyakṣanibandhanāmanubhavadvādhāṃ kathamiva pramāṇaṃ syāt ? |
SA15n1234:677: na cārthakriyānibandhanaṃ rūpamapāsya bījāderaparaḥ paramārthataḥ svabhāvo'sti,
SA15n1234:680: tasmāt sadṛśāparabhāvanibandhana evāyaṃ keśakadalīstambādiṣvivākārasāmyatāmātrāpahṛtahṛdayānāṃ bhrānta eva tattvādhyavasāyo mantavyaḥ |
SA15n1234:682: yadā tu vidhurapratyayopanipātād visadṛśāparabhāvaprasavaḥ tadā'sya tattvādhyavasāyī pratyabhijñāpratyayo na bhūtimavalambate |
SA15n1234:684: bhedā'viśeṣe'pi ca svahetubalāyātaprakṛtivaśāt kecidevaikākāraparāmarśapratyayalakṣaṇāmarthajñānādilakṣaṇāṃ vā'rthakriyāṃ kurvvanti nāpara iti vipañcitaṃ pramāṇavārtika eva śāstrakṛteti neha prapañcyate |
SA15n1234:685: [17. anumānenāpi pratyabhijñāyā bādhāt na tataḥ sthirabhāvasiddhiḥ |]
SA15n1234:686: avaśyaṃ ca bījāderjanakājanakāvasthayorvvastubhedo yathokto'vagantavya iti darśayitumanamānamabhedasya bādhakamāha-“bhāvānāṃ” bījādīnāṃ svakāryajanako yaḥ “svabhāvaḥ” tasya teṣu satsu “anyathātvābhāvāt” kadācidajanakatvāsambhavāt “tatsvabhāvasya” aṅkurādijanakasvabhāvasya “paścādiva” salilādikāraṇasannidhāna iva “prāgapi” kuśūlādyavasthitikāle'pi svakārya “jananaprasaṅgāt” |
SA15n1234:687: tathā hi-salilādisannidhāne'pi bījādiḥ svarūpeṇaiva kāryaṃ karoti,
SA15n1234:691: ‘sa evāyam’ iti pratyabhijñāyāṃ puro'vasthāyino janakasvabhāvasya prācyarūpābhedādhyavasāyāt,
SA15n1234:692: tataḥ kimiti prāgapi tatkāryaṃ na kuryāditi ? |
SA15n1234:693: prayogaḥ-yad yadā yajjananasvabhāvaṃ tat tadā tajjanayatyeva |
SA15n1234:697: kuśūlādyavasthāsvapi cedaṃ bījādikaṃ svakāryajananasvabhāvameva pratyabhijñayā vyavasthāpyata iti svabhāvahetuprasaṅgaḥ |
SA15n1234:700: viparyayaprayogaḥ-yad yadā yajjananasvabhāvaṃ nirvvarttyaṃ kāryaṃ na janayati na tat tadā tajjananasvabhāvam,
SA15n1234:702: na janayati ca salilādikāraṇasannidheḥ prāk tatkāryajananasvabhāvanirvvarttyaṃ svakāryaṃ bījādikamiti vyāpakānupalabdhiḥ |
SA15n1234:703: tato'numānato'pi bādhāmanubhavat pratyabhijñānaṃ kathaṃ pramāṇaṃ syāt ? |
SA15n1234:711: na pratyakṣādanyad gariṣṭhaṃ pramāṇamiti cet | na |
SA15n1234:714: na hīyamanumānena pratyakṣātmikā satī bādhyata iti brūmahe |
SA15n1234:717: yadi cānumānavirodhamaśnuvānāpi pratyabhijñā pramāṇaṃ tadā''kārasya sāmyāt tadekatāṃ pratiyatī nīletarakusumādeḥ [pratītiḥ] kiṃ na pramāṇam ? |
SA15n1234:719: vistarataśca pratyabhijñāprāmāṇyanirāsaḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhāveva vihita ityāstāṃ tāvadiha |
SA15n1234:720: “yataḥ evam” uktena prakāreṇa janakājanakāvasthayoḥ bījādervvastubhedaḥ “tasmād yo'ntyo'vasthāviśeṣo” yadanantaraṃ aṅkurādikāryaprasavaḥ “sa evāṅkurajananasvabhāvaḥ”,
SA15n1234:725: ityata āha-‘pūrvabhāvinastu’ kuśūlādyavasthitikālabhāvinastu “avasthāviśeṣā aṅkukāraṇasyā”ntyasyāvasthāviśeṣasya “kāraṇāni” pratyayāntaropadhīyamānaviśeṣebhyaḥ paramparayā “tebhyastadutpatteḥ” |
SA15n1234:730: tadevaṃ yadā tāvat pratyabhijñānaṃ pratyakṣapramāṇatayā sthairyasiddhaye parairūcyate bījādivadanekāntaṃ pratipādayitum,
SA15n1234:731: tadā tasyoktena prakāreṇa pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ bādhyamānatvāt tadātmatā nāstīti kutastata ekatā bhāvānām ?
SA15n1234:733: yadā tu pratyabhijñāyamānatvāt pūrvvāparakālayorekasvabhāvā bījādaya iti hetutayocyate paraiḥ,
SA15n1234:735: na ca sa pakṣe kvacid varttata ityāha- “kṣaṇikeṣu bhāveṣu” asmābhiriṣyamāṇeṣu “aikyābhāvā”diti sambandhaḥ |
SA15n1234:737: atha yasyāpi kṣaṇikā bhāvāstasyāpi bījādīnāṃ pratikṣaṇamaikyābhāve'pi viśeṣānupalakṣaṇādantyakṣaṇavat sarvveṣāṃ janakasvabhāvānāmapi tabhdāvaṃ prati salilādyapekṣatvāt tadavasthamanaikāntikatvam ityāśaṅkayāha- “aparāparotpatteḥ” kṣaṇikairapi nānekāntaḥ,
SA15n1234:738: aparebhyo'parebhyaśca pratyayebhyaḥ pratikṣaṇamutpatteḥ kṣaṇikānāṃ bhinnaśaktitvādantyakṣaṇavajjanakasvabhāvatāvirahāt kutastairapyanekāntaḥ syāt ? |
SA15n1234:741: tathā ca vakṣyati-‘aparāparapratyayayogena pratikṣaṇaṃ bhinnaśaktayaḥ santanvantaḥ saṃskārā yadyapi kutaścit sāmyāt samānarūpāḥ pratīyante tathāpi bhinna eva eṣāṃ svabhāvaḥ,
SA15n1234:743: yaduktaṃ ‘tatsvabhāvasya jananāt’ ityasyānekāntamubhdāvayannāha paraḥ-“te” bījakṣityādayaḥ “antyāḥ” ante bhavāḥ pratyekamaṅkurajanane ‘samarthāḥ’ khaṇḍaśaḥ kāraṇebhyaḥ kāryotpādābhāvād bhavabhdiriṣyanta iti “kinna janayanti pratyekam” ? |
SA15n1234:745: tadanye tu tatsvabhāvā api na janayantīti ‘tatsvabhāvasya jananāt’ ityanekāntaḥ |
SA15n1234:746: tadvat kuśūlādyavasthā api bījādayo'ṅkurādijananasvabhāvā api na jānayiṣyantīti tairanekāntaḥ tadavastha eveti manyate paraḥ |
SA15n1234:750: yai hi na janayeyurjananasvabhāvā eva na syuḥ |
SA15n1234:754: pratyekamantyānāṃ janakatve kāryasyaikena jananādapareṣāmupayogasya nirvviṣayatvādajananameveti manyamāna āha paraḥ-“teṣu” antyeṣu “sahakāriṣu” saha-yugapat karaṇaśīleṣu “samarthasvabhāveṣu” tatkāryakriyāyogyeṣu abhyupagamyamāneṣu satsu “kāryasyaikenaiva janitatvāt ko'parasyopayogaḥ ?
SA15n1234:757: etat pariharati-‘na vai’ naiva “bhāvānāṃ” bījādīnāṃ kācit “prekṣāpūrvvakāritā” buddhipūrvvakāritā,
SA15n1234:760: ’ ityālocya “apare nivarteran” audāsīnyaṃ bhajamānāstatkāryajanane na vyāpriyeran |
SA15n1234:761: yasmāt “te” bījādayo bhāvāḥ “nirabhiprāyavyāpārāḥ” paryālocanāśūnyavyāpārā ekata utpadyamāne “kārye sarvva eva vyāpriyante” |
SA15n1234:762: bhavanadharmmaṇi ca kārye teṣāṃ prāgbhāva eva vyāpāraḥ |
SA15n1234:764: yadi hi vyāpṛtādanya eva vyāpāraḥ tadā tata eva kāryotpādād vyāpāravataḥ kārakatvameva hīyate |
SA15n1234:765: tasyāsau vyāpāraḥ tatastasya kārakatvam iti cet |
SA15n1234:766: nanvevaṃ vyāpāropayogasya kāryānupayogini tatropacārāt pāramārthikamasya kārakatvaṃ hīyeta |
SA15n1234:773: abhimatenaiva vyāpṛtena tabdyāpārotpādanāt nātiprasaṅgaḥ iti cet |
SA15n1234:776: yena ca pariśrameṇa vyāpāraṃ janayati tena kāryameva kinnotpādayati ?
SA15n1234:778: yathā ca svasannidhimātrenaivāyaṃ vyāpāraṃ janayati na vyāpārāntareṇa,
SA15n1234:781: tasmād bhāvini kārye prāgbhāva eva kāraṇasya vyāpāraḥ |
SA15n1234:782: sa ca sarvveṣāmastīti sarvva eva kāryotpattau vyāpriyanta iti vyapadiśyante |
SA15n1234:783: “tadapi kāryaṃ sarvvebhya eva jāyate” sarvveṣāṃ bhāva eva tabhdāvāt |
SA15n1234:784: na hi kāryasya kāraṇābhimatabhāva eva bhāvamantareṇāparaṃ janma |
SA15n1234:785: tathābhāve hi tatraiva kāraṇavyāpārāt kāryakriyaivaiṣāṃ na sambhavet |
SA15n1234:786: tataśca satsvapi kāraṇeṣu kathamasya bhāva upalabdhirvvā syāt ? |
SA15n1234:787: tatsambandhino janmanaḥ karaṇāt iti cet | na |
SA15n1234:796: tasmāt kāryamevābhūtvā hetubhāve bhavatīti bhāva evāsya tato janmeti sarvvebhyastat jāyate |
SA15n1234:797: nanvekasyāpi tajjanane sāmarthyāt apareṣāṃ tatra sannidhilakṣaṇo vyāpāro vyartha eveti na tatrapareṣāṃ bhāvaḥ saṅgacchata iti cedāha-“svahetoḥ” kṣitibījasalilādisāmagrīlakṣaṇasya “pariṇāmaḥ” kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣavataḥ pratikṣaṇamupadhīyamānātiśayasya kṣaṇāntarasya prasavaḥ,
SA15n1234:798: tataḥ “upanidhiḥ” kāryadeśe sannidhānaṃ “dharmmo” yeṣāṃ te “tathābhavantaḥ” kāryadeśe sannidhīyamānāḥ “nopālambhamarhanti”- ‘ekasyāpyetatkāryakaraṇe samarthatvāt kimatra bhavantaḥ sannihitāḥ ?
SA15n1234:800: na hi tadaparasannidhimantareṇa tatraikasyāpi bhāva upapadyate |
SA15n1234:804: tataśca pratikṣaṇamupadhīyamānātiśayasyotpādāt kevalānāṃ ca tajjananasvabhāvavaikalyāt tadaparapratyayayogajanyasvabhāvatvāt samarthajanakasya hetoḥ |
SA15n1234:806: tasmād yatsāmagrījanyasvabhāvo yo bhāvaḥ sa tatraikābhāve'pi kāraṇavaikalyānna sambhavatītyekasāmagrījanmanāṃ sahabhāvo niyataḥ |
SA15n1234:807: sarvveṣāṃ teṣāṃ bhāva eva kāryasya bhāvāt sarvva eva janayantīti ‘tatsvabhāvasya jananāt’ ityatra nānekāntaḥ iti |
SA15n1234:808: yenābhiprāyeṇa ‘te'ntyāḥ samarthāḥ kinna janayanti’ ityuktaṃ taṃ prakaṭayannāha- “samarthāḥ” ityādi |
SA15n1234:815: tau cānvayavyatirekāvekatraiva kārye dṛśyete nāparāparatreti tasyaivaikasya janane samarthā gamyanta iti nāparaparajananam |
SA15n1234:816: te tu yadavasthā janayanto dṛśyante-kiṃ tajjananasvabhāvāstadaiva ?
SA15n1234:819: tatra prāgapi tatsvabhāvatve paścādiva prāgapi janaprasaṅga iti pratikṣaṇaṃ bheda ucyata iti |
SA15n1234:821: punaranyathā kṣapaṇakajaiminīyā anekāntamubhdāvayanta āhuḥ-“bhinnaḥ” parasparavyāvṛttaḥ “svabhāvo” yeṣāṃ tebhyaścakṣurādibhyaḥ “sahakāribhyaḥ” yugapatkartṛbhyaḥ “ekasya” vijñānalakṣaṇasya “kāryasyotpattau” satyām,
SA15n1234:822: bahūni bhinnasvabhāvāni kāraṇāni kāryaṃ tvekamabhinnasvabhāvamiti “na kāraṇabhedāt kāryabhedaḥ syāt ” |
SA15n1234:823: tataścakṣurādayo na bhinnenātmanaikasya kāryasya janakā eṣṭavyāḥ |
SA15n1234:824: kintvabhinnameṣāmekakāryajanakaṃ sāmānyabhūtaṃ rūpamupeyaṃ yenābhinnaṃ kāryaṃ janayanti |
SA15n1234:825: tacca samagrāvasthāyāmeva tatkāryaṃ janayati na vyagrāvasthāyām |
SA15n1234:831: tato yadasya samagreṣu cakṣurādiṣu janakaṃ rūpaṃ tadekaikābhāve'pi vidyate na ca janayatīti ‘tatsvabhāvasya jananāt’ ityanekānta iti |
SA15n1234:840: nanu tadavasthāyāṃ pratyekameva sāmagrīśabdavācyānāṃ jananasvabhāvatvābhyupagamāt pratyekameva cakṣurādikaṃ kāraṇam |
SA15n1234:841: yadyevaṃ ko'yaṃ niyamo yadanekasmād bhavatā'nekena bhavitavyam viparyaye bādhakapramāṇābhāvāt,
SA15n1234:842: ekenaiva tat kāryaṃ kartavyamiti ca na niyamakāraṇamutpaśyāmaḥ |
SA15n1234:846: taduktam-“tasyaiveikasya janane samarthāḥ nānyasya iti nāparāparajananam” iti |
SA15n1234:851: taccānekabhāva eva bhāvāt tatkāryamucyate tasya kuto'nekatāprasaṅgaḥ? |
SA15n1234:852: yattvabhinnaṃ rūpaṃ janakamucyate tasyaikasthitāvapi bhāvāt tatkāryajananasvabhāvācca tataḥ kāryaprasavaprasaṅgaḥ,
SA15n1234:853: tadanyasannidhau tasya viśeṣābhāvāt tadāpi vāna janayet |
SA15n1234:854: tasmād yeṣuṃ bhāvābhāvavatsu kāryaṃ bhāvābhāvavad dṛṣṭaṃ ta eva viśeṣā janakā iti kuto'nekāntaḥ ? |
SA15n1234:855: atha sāmagrīṃ kāraṇamāśrityocyate ‘na kāraṇabhedāt kāryabhedaḥ syāditi’,
SA15n1234:857: “yathāsvaṃ” yasyāḥ sāmagryāḥya ātmīyaḥ svabhāvastabhdedena “tadviśeṣopayogataḥ” tasya-vijñānalakṣaṇasya kāryasya,
SA15n1234:859: teṣūpayogataḥ tadupayogaiḥ bhinnasāmagrīvyāpāraiḥ kāryāḥ ye svabhāvaviśeṣāḥ- kāryāṇāṃviśiṣṭāḥ svabhāvāḥ teṣāmasaṅkarātparasparavyāvṛttarūpatvāt |
SA15n1234:860: sāmagrībhedād bhinnarūpataiva kāryāṇāmiti kathanna kāraṇabhedād kāryabhedaḥ syāt ? |
SA15n1234:866: tato'pyabhrāntavijñānasambhūtiriti bhinnasāmagrījanmanāṃ kāryasvabhāvaviśeṣāṇāmasāṅkaryādastyeva sāmagrīlakṣaṇakāraṇabhedāt kāryāṇāṃ bheda iti |
SA15n1234:867: nanu yadā viṣayendriyamanaskārebhyo vijñānasambhavaḥ tadā teṣāmupayogaviṣayasyaikatvāt kathamasāṅkaryam ? |
SA15n1234:872: kiṃ nu vai samagrāṇāmanyānyakāryajananena janakatvam yatastadabhāve tanna syāt |
SA15n1234:873: janakatvaṃ hyeṣāṃ tabhdāva eva kasyacid bhāvāt |
SA15n1234:876: nanvekasyāḥ sāmagryā anekasya bhāve sāmagryantarajanyebhyo bhavatu bhedaḥ,
SA15n1234:879: tatra yadā cakṣūrūpamanaskārebhyo vijñānajanma tadā cakṣūrūpakṣaṇayorapi bhāvād vijñānenābhinnahetujatvāt tayorvvijñānātmatā,
SA15n1234:880: vijñānasya vā tadrūpatā kathaṃ na prasajyeta ? | āha ca-
SA15n1234:889: anyādaśī ca vijñānāderiti tadvailakṣaṇyādeva kāryāṇāṃ vailakṣaṇyam |
SA15n1234:897: niyamena ca vijñānamātrabhāve samanantarapratyayasya vyāpāro na cakṣurādeḥ |
SA15n1234:898: cakṣuḥkṣaṇāntarodaye ca pūrvvabhāvinaścakṣuṣo na svavijñānayogyatāhetoḥ samanantarapratyayasya |
SA15n1234:901: pratyayanibandhanatayā svasantatipatitakāryaprasūtinimittaṃ tad upādānakāraṇaṃ yat santānāntare prāgavasthāpekṣaviśeṣodayanibandhanaṃ tat sahakārikāraṇam |
SA15n1234:902: sā ceyaṃ bhāvānāṃ svahetuparamparayātā prakṛtiryayā kiñcit kāryaṃ svasantānavyavasthānibandhanaṃ janayantyaparaṃ ca santānāntaravyapadeśanibandhanamiti tasyā eva sāmagryā avāntaraviśeṣakṛtatvāccakṣūrūpavijñānakṣaṇānāṃ parasparato vailakṣaṇyaṃ na virudhyate |
SA15n1234:904: tasmād yadi ‘kāraṇabhedāt’ kāraṇānekatvāt “kāryasya bhedaḥ” anekatvaṃ tadā pratibandhābhāvādanekāntaḥ |
SA15n1234:905: na ca tadabhyupagamyata iti na kācit kṣatiḥ |
SA15n1234:906: atha sāmagrīlakṣaṇasya kāraṇasya bhedaḥ sāmagryantarād vailakṣaṇyaṃ kāryasyāpi bhedo'tatkāraṇebhyo bhinnasvabhāvatocyate |
SA15n1234:907: tadā tasyeha bhāvāt kathaṃ na kāraṇabhedāt kāryabhedaḥ syāt ?
SA15n1234:908: iti abhiprāyavatā ‘na’ kāraṇabhedāt kāryabhedo na syāt |
SA15n1234:911: ubhayaṃ caitat kāryeṣu pramāṇaparidṛṣṭamiti darśayannāha- “yathā” ityādi |
SA15n1234:912: mṛtpiṇḍādibhyo hi bhavato ghaṭasya na kāraṇānekatve'pyanekarūpatā |
SA15n1234:914: tatra sāmagryantarajanyāt tāvad bhedaṃ darśayati-“mṛtpiṇḍāt” ityādi |
SA15n1234:915: iha mṛtpiṇḍakulālasūtrāṇi vyagrasvabhāvāni kāraṇāntarasahitāni iṣṭakādilakṣaṇāni tadanyajanyebhyo'bhinnasvabhāvāni yāni kāryāṇi sādhayanti tebhyo vilakṣaṇameva samagrāṇi ghaṭātmakaṃ kāryaṃ janayanti |
SA15n1234:916: tathā hi-kulālādinirapekṣo mṛtpiṇḍaḥ tadanyajanyād vṛkṣādervilakṣaṇamevopādānabhāvena mṛdātmakaṃ kāryaṃ janayan dṛṣṭaḥ |
SA15n1234:919: evaṃ kulālādikamapi tadanyopādānasahitaṃ sahakāribhāvena yatkāryaṃ karoti tadvilakṣaṇameva mṛtpiṇḍasahitaṃ tatkāraṇāhitaviśeṣaṃ ghaṭātmakaṃ kāryaṃ janayatīti samudāyārthaḥ |
SA15n1234:920: tatra mṛtpiṇḍād bhinnaḥ svabhāvo ghaṭasya ye tadanyopadānakāraṇatayā mṛtsvabhāvā na bhavanti vṛkṣādayastebhyo bhavati |
SA15n1234:921: “kulālāt” mṛtpiṇḍopādānāhitātiśayāt sahākāribhāvenopayujyamānāt “tasyaiva ghaṭasya” mṛtpiṇḍopādānatayā mṛdātmanaḥ sataḥ “saṃsthānaviśeṣaḥ” pṛthubudhnodarādyākāraḥ tadātmatayā tadanyebhyo yeṣāṃ mṛtpiṇḍastadanyanimittasahita upādānamiṣṭakādīnāṃ tebhyo bhinnaḥ svabhāvo bhavati |
SA15n1234:922: “sūtrāt” mṛtpiṇḍakulālakāraṇāhitaviśeṣāt tasyaiva ghaṭasya “mṛtsaṃsthānaviśeṣātmano” mṛtpiṇḍakulālayostajjananasvabhāvatvāt ghaṭasya tadrūpayogāt “tayośca” sūtrakāraṇopahitaviśeṣayostannirapekṣāvasthāto bhinnātmakatayā “cakrādervvibhakto” vichinnaḥ “svabhāvo bhavati” tasmādanu[krā]ntakāraṇatrayajanyo ghaṭaḥ tadanyasmādekaikakāryād dvidvikāryācca bhinnasvabhāva eva jāyata iti sāmagrībhedād bhinnānyeva kāryāṇi parasparamasaṅkīrṇṇasvabhāvāni bhavantīti tadupayogakāryaviśeṣāsaṅkaraḥ siddhaḥ |
SA15n1234:927: yata evaṃ sāmagrībhedād bhinnānyeveṣṭakācakrāvibhaktaghaṭatavdibhaktaghaṭalakṣaṇāni kāryāṇi bhavanti “tat” tasmāt “evam” uktena prakāreṇa kulālāt mṛtpiṇḍarahitādanyasāmagryantarbhūtāt na mṛtsvabhāvatā kasyacit kāryasya,
SA15n1234:929: na mṛdaḥ kevalāyāḥ tatsāmagrībahirbhūtāyāḥ saṃsthānaviśeṣaḥ kulālopādānopakṛtāyā eva mṛtsaṃsthānaviśeṣātmakakāryahetutvāt |
SA15n1234:931: tadevaṃ sāmagrībhedād bhedaṃ kāryasyodāharaṇe pratipādya sahakāriṇāmanekatve'pyanekātmatāvirahaṃ pratipādayannāha-“na ca tayoḥ” mṛtkulālayoḥ sahitayoḥ parasparopādānopakṛtātmanoḥ yaḥ śaktiviśeṣaḥ pratyayāntarasahitāvasthāto viśiṣṭā yogyatā tadviṣayasya tadanyāvasthāviṣayād bhede satyapi yathā tadanyasmād bhedaḥ,
SA15n1234:934: tābhyāṃ janito yo viśeṣo mṛtsaṃsthānaviśeṣātmakaḥ sa eva tadanyasāmagrījanyād bhidyata iti bhedo asya |
SA15n1234:935: kathaṃ punareta[d] jñāyate ‘tadanyasmādiva svabhāvato'pyasya bhedo nāsti’ ityata āha- “mṛtsaṃsthānayoḥ” ityādi |
SA15n1234:936: yadi hi mṛtkulālayoḥ tadavasthābhāvinoḥ “śaktiviśeṣaviṣayo” mṛtsaṃsthānaviśeṣātmako “bheda”stadanyasmādiva svarūpato bhidyeta tadā mṛtsaṃsthānayo “raparasparātmatayā” parasparātmatāviraheṇa kāraṇena saṃsthānaviśeṣeṇa mṛt na pratibhāseta,
SA15n1234:939: na hi yo yasya svabhāvo na bhavati sa tenātmanā svagrāhiṇi jñāne pratibhāsate,
SA15n1234:941: jñānaṃ vā tadrūpavikalārthasāmarthyenotpadyamānaṃ tadrūpamanukartuṃ yuktam bhrāntatāprasaṅgena tadvaśādarthavyavasthānābhāvaprasakteḥ |
SA15n1234:942: tasmāt mṛtsaṃsthānayorekātmataiveti na kāraṇānekatvāt kāryasyānekātmakatā aikāntikī,
SA15n1234:943: yato bhinnasvabhāvebhyaścakṣurādibhyaḥ sahakāribhyaḥ ekakāryotpattivirodhādekarūpatayā teṣāṃ sādhāraṇaikakāryakriyā,
SA15n1234:946: paramārthatastu tatsāmagryantarggatānāṃ sajātīyasyā'pi kṣaṇāntarasyārambhāt sāmagryantarāvayavatvena ca kāryāntarasyāpi yathā ekapratyayajanitaṃ kiñcidekaṃ nāsti tathā'nekapratyayajanitamapīti kāraṇānekatvāt kāryānekatvopagame'pi na kācit kṣatiḥ |
SA15n1234:950: nanu ca mṛtsaṃsthānaviśeṣayorekasvabhāvatve'pyahrīkādibhiḥ saṅkhayādibhedād bheda iṣyate tatkathamanekapratyayajanitasyaikatve etadudāharaṇam syāt ? |
SA15n1234:951: sarvvatraiva hi dravyaparyāyayoḥ saṅkhayāsaṃjñālakṣaṇakāryabhedād bhedo deśakālasvabhāvābhedāccābheda iṣyate,
SA15n1234:953: tathā hi-eko ghaṭaḥ rūpādayo bahava iti saṅkhyābhedaḥ |
SA15n1234:960: evaṃ sarvvatra dravyaparyāyoḥ saṅkhayādibhirbhedaḥ deśādibhistvabheda iti mṛtsaṃsthānayoḥ kathañcit bhedāt mṛtkulālābhyāṃ janitasya kāryasyānekatā'styeva |
SA15n1234:961: yathā tvekatā tathā tābhyāṃ tasya abhinnātmajanyataiveti yadanekakāraṇaṃ tadanekameva,
SA15n1234:962: yat punarekaṃ tat sahakāriṇāmabhinnarūpajanyatayaikakāraṇameveti na vyabhicāra iti |
SA15n1234:965: svabhāvato bhedopagame vā'parasparātmatayā bhṛtsaṃsthānayoḥ saṃsthānamṛtsvabhavaviśeṣābhyāṃ tayorapratibhāsanaṃ durnnivāram |
SA15n1234:966: yadi hi svabhāvato na bhedo dharmmadharmmiṇoḥ,
SA15n1234:968: na hi pararūpāḥ bhidyamānā api saṅkhayādaya ātmabhūtamabhedaṃ bādhituṃ samarthāḥ |
SA15n1234:972: na ca bahuvacanasya niyamenādarśanād rūpādayo'tra nimittam,
SA15n1234:973: rūpādinimittatve hi guruḥ iti na kadācidekavacanaṃ syāt |
SA15n1234:974: sambhavi dharmmirūpamātramabhidheyatvena vivakṣitam iti cet | na |
SA15n1234:977: brīhaya iti ca jātivacane dharmmiṇo rūpādīnāṃ cānabhidhānāt na kiñciduttaram |
SA15n1234:978: ubhayarūpasya ca vastuno guruśabdavācyatvāt kathaṃ sambhavino dharmmirūpasyaikatvena vivakṣā ? |
SA15n1234:986: atrāpi indanāt śakanāt dāraṇācca śaktibhedo gamyata iti cet | na |
SA15n1234:989: na hi śaktireva indati śankoti dārayati ca |
SA15n1234:995: yeṣāṃ ca paryāyāṇāṃ na kācidarthānugamamātrā tatra kiṃ vaktavyam ? |
SA15n1234:1002: paryāyā eva paryāyarūpeṇa nirudhyante na tu dravyamiti nityamabhyupagamyate |
SA15n1234:1003: na ceyaṃ kūṭasthanityatā vā dravye sambhavati,
SA15n1234:1011: tatra pūrvvaṃ bhavati bhedanivandhanam yadīha sambhavet |
SA15n1234:1015: paṭādayo'pi hi vibhaktapariṇāmā anekaṃ kāryaṃ kurvanto dṛṣṭāḥ |
SA15n1234:1019: yata ekasya kāraṇātmanaḥ ekakāryarūpatopagame tadanyarūpābhāvāt tadanyakāryātmatopagatirnna syāt |
SA15n1234:1020: kintvapūrvvameva kasyacid bhāve prāgavidyamānaṃ bhavat tatkāryam |
SA15n1234:1021: tatra viṣayendriyamanaskārāṇāmitaretaropadānāhitarūpabhedānāṃ sannidhau viśiṣṭasvetarakṣaṇabhāve pratyekaṃ tabhdāvābhāvānuvidhānādanekakriyopagamo na virudhyate |
SA15n1234:1034: tatra vijñānajananasvabhāvataiveti tasyājananasvabhāvatā vyavacchidyate tasyā eva pratiyogitvāt nānyajananasvabhāvatā |
SA15n1234:1037: na hi tadanyāpekṣayā viparyavyāvṛttimupādāyānekena śabdenābhidhīyamānaṃ vastu anekarūpatāṃ pratipadyate,
SA15n1234:1042: tannimittānāmekatra bhāvāt adoṣa iti cet | na |
SA15n1234:1056: ekasyānekakriyā'nabhyupagame ca yo'yaṃ rūparasagandhasparśaviśeṣāṇāṃ kvacit sahabhāvaniyamaḥ pramāṇaparidṛṣṭaḥ sa na syāt |
SA15n1234:1062: anekenaikasvabhāvatāṃ cānubhavataḥ tadvadanekatāyā durnivāratvāt anyathā dharmmadharmmiṇāṃ kathaṃ naikāntiko bhedaḥ ? |
SA15n1234:1063: tathā hi-yamātmānaṃ purodhāyā'yaṃ dharmmī paryāyāścaite iti vyavasthāpyate,
SA15n1234:1066: na hi parasparopādānakṛtopakārānapekṣā viṣayendriyamanaskārāḥ sahaikakāryārambhiṇo yuktāḥ |
SA15n1234:1073: tataśca svasantānakṣaṇamitaropādānaṃ ca yugapadupakurvvataḥ kathamekasyānekakāryatā na syāt ? |
SA15n1234:1075: dravyaparyāyāṇāṃ caikasvabhāvatāmācakṣāṇa ekasyānekakāryatāṃ pratikṣipatīti kathaṃ nonmattaḥ ?
SA15n1234:1078: ekasvabhāvatve ca dravyaparyāyāṇāṃ tatkāryabheda ekavastunibandhana eveti kāryabhedād bhedamabhidadhānaḥ sphuṭamahrīka evāyamityupekṣāmarhati |
SA15n1234:1080: vaiśeṣiko'pi dravyasyaikasya dravyaguṇakarmmaṇāṃ samavāyikāraṇatāṃ bruvāṇaḥ karmmaṇaścaikasya saṃyogavibhāgasaṃskāranimittatāmekasyānekakāryakriyāṃ pratikṣipan svakṛtāntakopenaiva pratihataḥ |
SA15n1234:1088: tathā hi-deśakālayorabhede'pi rūparasagandhasparśāḥ paryāyarūpeṇa bhidyante tataḥ kathamabhedasiddhiḥ ? |
SA15n1234:1098: anuvṛttivyāvṛttyośca svabhāvatve lakṣaṇāt svabhāvasya bhedo vaktavyaḥ |
SA15n1234:1103: tataśca padārthadvayameva syāt na tvekaṃ dvirūpamiti |
SA15n1234:1109: kathaṃ tarhi sa eka ityucyate anekaḥ san ? |
SA15n1234:1116: yogyatvācca viśvasya kṛtākṛtānāmekābhidhānābhidheyatvasya kvacidasambhavāt śaktibhedācca viṣayabhedaṃ brūvāṇaṃ prati abhihitam |
SA15n1234:1119: tathā hi- śaśāṅkodayaṃ bahavo nirīkṣante tasya kathamekatvamabhyupagatam ? |
SA15n1234:1121: sarvvathedaṃ na kathañcidapi saṅgacchate yaduta ekasya dvairūpyamiti |
SA15n1234:1122: vijñānaṃ tu nīlapraticchāyatayotpadyamānaṃ pītādipratibhāsavyavacchedena prativiśiṣṭaṃ khyāpyate,
SA15n1234:1123: na punarasya bhāvato dve rūpe staḥ |
SA15n1234:1124: atha punardravyaparyāyayoḥ sammūrcchitatvāt narasiṃhavadekaṃ śabalarūpatvāt dvīrūpamucyate |
SA15n1234:1128: te ca paramāṇavaḥ pratyekaṃ narasiṃharūpā na bhavanti,
SA15n1234:1131: jātyantaraṃ ca sa eva narasiṃhābhyāṃ syāt,
SA15n1234:1136: iti kevalamanekatve'pi bahuṣvekakāryadarśanāt senādivadekavyavahāradarśanakṛto'yaṃ viparyāso jaḍamatīnām |
SA15n1234:1139: tathā hi paryāyā abhinnadeśakālasvabhāvāśca paryāyarūpeṇa ca bhidyante pūrvoktācca dharmmadharmmiṇornniṣedhānnobhayavādasambhava iti |
SA15n1234:1166: bhinnaṃ paryāyarūpaṃ hi dravyarūpād bhaved yadi ||10 ||
SA15n1234:1167: tadaitat syādabhede tu naitat saṃbadhyate vacaḥ |
SA15n1234:1173: svabhāvasyaiva bhedena kiṃ bhedaśca na kīrttitaḥ ? |
SA15n1234:1174: na hi paścābhdavan bhedaḥ kāryāṇāṃ tasya bhedakaḥ ||14 ||
SA15n1234:1176: ekāntena vibhinne ca te syātāṃ vastunī sa ca ||15 ||
SA15n1234:1195: ekamiṣṭaṃ jananyā ca jāyāyāḥ kiṃ na caikatā ? ||24 ||
SA15n1234:1197: pratyekaṃ ye prasajyante dvayorbhāve kathaṃ na te ? ||25 ||
SA15n1234:1200: madhuraṃ na hi sarvvaṃ syāt kaphaheturyathā madhu |
SA15n1234:1201: tīkṣṇaṃ vā pittajanakaṃ yathā māgadhikā matā ||27 ||
SA15n1234:1202: pratyekaṃ yannidānaṃ yat svato miśraṃ tadātmakam |
SA15n1234:1207: ye bhedābheda mātre tu doṣāḥ sambhavinaḥ katham? |
SA15n1234:1208: tatsabhdāve'pi te na syuriti brūyād vicakṣaṇaḥ ||30 ||
SA15n1234:1211: bhāgā eva ca bhāsante sanniviṣṭāstathā tathā |
SA15n1234:1219: aspaṣṭarūpā gamyante śabdebhyo'pi ta eva hi |
SA15n1234:1228: tayorapi bhaved bhedo yadi yenātmanā tayoḥ |
SA15n1234:1230: bheda eva tathā ca syānnaivekasya dvirūpatā |
SA15n1234:1234: tasya bhedo'pi tābhyāṃ ced yadi yenātmanā ca te |
SA15n1234:1238: dharmmitvaṃ tasya caivaṃ syāt tattantratvāt tadanyayoḥ |
SA15n1234:1239: na caivaṃ gamyate tena vādo'yaṃ jālmakalpitaḥ ||45 ||”
SA15n1234:1241: tadevaṃ mṛtsaṃsthānayorekasvabhāvatve na kathañcibhdedasambhava iti sahakāriṇāmanekatve'pi na kāryasyānekatvamityatra bhavatyetadudāharaṇamiti |
SA15n1234:1247: tena yadi mṛtpiṇḍasya mṛdātmatāyāṃ vyāpāraḥ kulālasya tatsaṃsthānaviśeṣe kathyate,
SA15n1234:1250: mṛtsaṃsthānayoḥ svabhāvabhede dūṣaṇamuktam “mṛtsaṃsthānayoraparasparātmatayā” ityādikamiti na saṃsthānasya mṛddravyādanyatvam |
SA15n1234:1251: tato mṛtpiṇḍopādānāhitātiśayena tatkāryakṣaṇasahakāriṇā kulālena tadupādānopakṛtātmanā tatkāryakṣaṇasahakāriṇā mṛtpiṇḍena ca pratyekaṃ sakalameva mṛtsaṃsthānātmakaṃ kāryaṃ kriyata iti na kāraṇānekatve'pyanekatvamasya |
SA15n1234:1253: yat tad ghaṭagataṃ saṃsthānaṃ “yadi tata” mṛdo “bhinnaṃ syāt” tadā kulālaḥ pṛthageva kimiti na karoti ? |
SA15n1234:1255: kulālaścānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ tasya saṃsthānasya guṇātmanaḥ kāraṇatayā gamyata iti “sa pṛthagapi” tat “kuryāt” |
SA15n1234:1257: “dravyāśrayya'guṇavān saṃyogavibhāgeṣvakāraṇamanapekṣa” iti guṇalakṣaṇāt sarvvadā guṇo dravyaparatantraḥ,
SA15n1234:1260: yadi svabhāvenaiva tasya guṇātmanaḥ saṃsthānasya “kriyāvad guṇavad” ityādivacanādādhārasvabhāvaṃ tat mṛddravyaṃ,
SA15n1234:1261: saṃsthānaṃ vā tathāvidhaṃ kapālādheyātmakaṃ tadā kimiti kulālavyāpāramapekṣate ? |
SA15n1234:1266: yat tat mṛddravyaṃ pṛthubudhnodarādyākāraṃ ca saṃsthānaṃ tayoryaḥ sambandha ādhārādheyalakṣaṇaḥ tatra yā “yogyatā” tāṃ “dvayamapyetat kulālād” yataḥ pratilabhate tasmāt “kulālamapekṣate” kulālānapekṣāyāṃ doṣamāha-“anyathā” yadi tayoḥ parasparasambandhayogyatāyāṃ kulālāpekṣā na syāt tadā svabhāvata eva mṛtpiṇḍasya tathavidhasaṃsthānasambandhayogyatvaṃ bhavet |
SA15n1234:1267: tasmiṃśca sati vastuna eva tatsaṃsthānasambandhayogyatālakṣaṇā dharmmatā'stīti kulālasannidheḥ prāgapi saṃsthānaviśeṣeṇa sambandhaḥ syāditi vaiśeṣikīyaścodyaparihāraḥ |
SA15n1234:1270: yadi parasparasambandhayogyatāyāṃ kulālamapekṣate “evaṃ tarhi sā yogyatā mṛddravyasya kulālād bhavati iti” āpannam |
SA15n1234:1272: yadi hi syāt tadā yogyatāyāḥ dravyāt pṛthakkaraṇaṃ “prāgvat prasajyeta” |
SA15n1234:1273: atha yogyatāyā api yogyapāratantryādapṛthaksiddhiṃ brūyāt tadā tasyā api vastudharmmatayaiva prāgapi samāveśo mā bhūditi dravyeṇa saha sambandhayogyatāyā anya yogyatā kulālād bhavatītyeṣṭavyā |
SA15n1234:1275: pṛthakkaraṇaprasaṅge vā punaḥ sa eva parihāraḥ tadīyaḥ,
SA15n1234:1280: mṛtpiṇḍakulālabhyāṃ kapāladravyasya saṃyogaviśeṣasambandhayogyasyārambhāt yadaikasvabhāvatve'pyekasyānekapratyayopādheyaviśeṣatā tadā siddhaḥ āsmākīnaḥ pakṣaḥ |
SA15n1234:1285: nirbandhagrahaṇena ca mṛtsaṃsthānayoraparasparātmatayā saṃsthānamṛtsvabhāvaviśeṣābhyāṃ tayorapratibhāsanaprasaṅgāt ityanayopapattyā sādhitamevānayorekatvam,
SA15n1234:1286: yuktyantarāṇāṃ sambhave'pi tadabhidhānalakṣaṇo nirbbandho na kriyate,
SA15n1234:1289: tadevaṃ sāmagrībhedāt sāmagryantarajanyebhyo bhedaḥ sahakāriṇāmanekatve'pi ca kāryasyaikatvamaviruddhamiti pratipādya upasaṃharannāha- “tena sahakāriṇa” ityādi |
SA15n1234:1292: ekasāmagrīvyapadeśaviṣayāṇāṃ ca sahakāriṇāmanekatve'pyanekasyaikakriyavirodhābhāvāt tadanvayavyatirekānuvidhāyinaśca kāryasyaikasya darśanāt svabhāvata ekatvaṃ sādhitam-tena kāraṇena sahakaraṇaśīlā ekasāmagryantarggatāḥ pratyayāḥ sāmagryantaraiḥ saha “naikopayogaviṣayāḥ” eka upayogasya viṣayo yeṣāṃ te na bhavanti,
SA15n1234:1294: anena yat prāg vikalpitaṃ ‘yadi kāraṇaśabdena sāmagrī bhaṇyate tadā tabhdedādastyevātatsāmagrījanyebhyaḥ kāryasya bheda iuti kimucyate-na kāraṇabhedād bhedaḥ syāt’ iti etadudā haraṇopadarśitaṃ nigamitam |
SA15n1234:1295: atha kāraṇaśabdena sāmagrīvyapadeśaviṣayāḥ sahakāriṇa ucyante tadā tabhdedādanekatvalakṣaṇāt kāryasyānekatvalakṣaṇo bhedo neṣyata eva,
SA15n1234:1297: ekasyānekata utpattidarśanācceti mṛtsaṃsthānayorekātmakatopadarśitaṃ nigamayati-‘kāryasvabhāvasya’ mṛtsaṃsthānātmana ‘ekatve'pi’ nānātvābhāve'pi ‘vastutaḥ’ paramārthataḥ kalpanābuddhau mṛtsaṃsthānayorbhinnayoriva pratibhāsane'pīti |
SA15n1234:1298: evam udāharaṇe sāmagrībhedāt kāryāṇāṃ bhedo naikasāmagrīviṣayapratyayabhedādanekatvaṃ kāryasyeti pratipādya prakṛte cakṣurādau yojayannāha- “yathā iho” dāharaṇe “kāraṇabhedaḥ” sāmagrībhedaḥ kulālavikalamṛtpiṇḍatatsahitasūtrādhikasāmagrītritayalakṣaṇo ‘bhinneṣu’ nānāsvabhāveṣu ‘viśeṣeṣu’ iṣṭakādicakrāvibhaktaghaṭatadvibhaktaghaṭalakṣaṇeṣūpayogā “nnaikakāryaḥ” kintu bhinnakārya eva,
SA15n1234:1299: “tathā” tenaiva prakāreṇa cakṣurādibhyo vijñānasyotpattau sāmagryantarāt sāmagrīlakṣaṇakāraṇabhedo'nekakārya ityunneyaḥ |
SA15n1234:1302: tato vijñānasya vikalpakasyetarasya vā tadupādeyatvena yā bodharūpatopalabdhā sā cakṣurvvijñānasyāpi bhavati |
SA15n1234:1305: “upalambhātmanaḥ sato bhavataḥ” jāyamānasya tadaiva tadekakāryapratiniyatasya cakṣurindriyasya sannidhānāt samanantarapratyayopādānopakṛtāt tato “rūpagrahaṇapratiniyamo” rūpākāratāpratiniyamaḥ,
SA15n1234:1308: “viṣayād” viṣayādhikāt samanantarapratyayādindriyācca “tena” viṣayeṇa “tulyarūpatā” na kevalaiva rūpapratibhāsitā bhrāntavijñānasyeveti viṣayendriyamanaskāralakṣaṇasāmagrīkāryamevaṃ pradarśitam |
SA15n1234:1310: atrābhinnatve'pi vastutaḥ “kāryasya” cakṣurvijñānalakṣaṇasya “kāraṇānāṃ” viṣāyendriyamanaskārāṇāṃ bhinnebhyaḥ svabhāvebhyaḥ kevalānāmeṣāṃ yaḥ svabhāvastato bhinnā evātajjanyebhyo vidhiśe (nyebhyo'pi viśe)
SA15n1234:1315: tena yaducyate- ‘yadi sahakāriṇāṃ bhede'pyabhinnaṃ kāryaṃ bhavati sāmagrībhede'pyabhinnamastu,
SA15n1234:1316: atha sāmagrībhedād bhinnaṃ bhavati sahakāribhedādapi kimiti bhinnaṃ na bhavati viśeṣābhāvāt ?
SA15n1234:1318: tathā hi-parasparopasarppaṇādyāśrayāt pratyayaviśeṣādekakāryoddeśenetaretarasantānopakārācca sahakāriṇāṃ pratiniyataśaktināmudayādekaṃ kāryaṃ samājāyate |
SA15n1234:1319: sāmagryantarasya tu kāryāntaraprabhavaśaktinibandhanebhyo hetvantarebhyaḥ svabhāvabhedavato bhāvād bhinnakāryaprasūtiriti kuto viśeṣābhāvaḥ ? |
SA15n1234:1321: nanu ca sarvvaṃ kāryaṃ sādhāraṃ yathā upādāyarūpam |
SA15n1234:1322: taddhi bhūtebhyo jāyamānaṃ tānyevāśrayata iti bhavabhdiriṣyate |
SA15n1234:1325: tasya ca kāraṇasya pūrvvaṃ janakatvaṃ paścāt kāryaṃ pratyādhārabhāva eva,
SA15n1234:1327: tatastatsvabhāvasya jananādityanekāntaḥ tadavastha evetyata āha-“ta evaite” ye'nantaramuktāḥ “kāraṇaśaktibhedāḥ” kāraṇānāṃ śaktiviśeṣāḥ |
SA15n1234:1328: kīdṛśāḥ ? “yathāsvaṃ” yeṣāṃ kāraṇaśaktibhedānāṃ sahakārilakṣaṇānāṃ yadātmīyaṃ sāmagryantarajanyāt prativiśiṣṭaṃ kāryaṃ tasya janane'vyavadheyā vyavadhātuṃ pratibandhumaśakyā śaktiryeṣāṃ tabhdāvastayā “ avyavadheyaśaktitayā” avaśyaṃ kāryakāriśaktitayā “pratyupasthitāḥ” udyuktāḥ santaḥ “sāmagrīkāryasya” ekapratyayajanitasya kasyacidabhāvāt sarvvaṃ sāmagryā eva kāryamiti kṛtvā sāmagrīkāryasya svabhāvasthityāśraya ityucyante |
SA15n1234:1332: svabhāvāntarotpādane yāvatpratibandhako vyāpriyate tāvat kṣaṇikasya svakāryaṃ kṛtvaiva nirodhāt |
SA15n1234:1335: yasmāt “tat” vijñānalakṣaṇa kāryaṃ “tebhyaḥ” cakṣurādibhya “samastabhyo” bodharūpatayā tadanyasmāt tadajanyāt “prativiśiṣṭasvabhāvamekaṃ” khaṇḍaśaḥ kāryasyānutpādādekaikasmāt sakalasyaiva bhāvādekaṃ jātam,
SA15n1234:1341: yadapi bhūtānāmupādāyarūpaṃ pratyāśrayatvamucyate tadapi svadeśasyāsya janakatvameveti na kiñcit prāgjanakaṃ bhūtvā paścāt sthāpakatāmupaiti,
SA15n1234:1344: punaranyathā tatsvabhāvasya jananādityanekāntobhdāvanaṃ parasyāśaṅkyāha- “apratirodhaśaktikeṣu” avidyamānaḥ pratirodhaḥpratibandho yasyāḥ śakteḥ sā yeṣām |
SA15n1234:1346: ye hyutpannāḥ kālakṣepeṇa kāryaṃ kurvvanti teṣāṃ syādapi śaktipratibandho,
SA15n1234:1347: na tu ya udayānantarameva kāryaṃ kurvvanti |
SA15n1234:1354: teṣvevaṃvidheṣu “pratyayeṣu parasparaṃ kaḥ sahakārārthaḥ” yena sahakāriṇa ucyante ? |
SA15n1234:1362: na ca kevalā janayantīti tatsvabhāvasya jananādityanekānta eveti manyate |
SA15n1234:1363: etat pariharati-“na vai” naiva atiśayotpādanaṃ sahakriyā yatastadabhāvāt sahakāriṇo na syuḥ |
SA15n1234:1364: kva punaratiśayotpādanaṃ sahakriyā pratyayānāṃ na bhavati ? |
SA15n1234:1374: atiśayotpādanameva tu mukhyam ityat āha- “tadeva” ekakāryakaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ “mukhyaṃ sahakāritvam” nātiśayotpādanalakṣaṇam,
SA15n1234:1377: kuta etat ? ityāha- “tasyaiva antyasya” vivakṣitakāryaṃ prati “kāraṇatvāt” |
SA15n1234:1381: yathā cāntyasyaikārthakaraṇaṃ sahakāritvam evaṃ pūrvvasyāpi kāraṇakalāpasyottarottaraviśiṣṭakṣaṇāntarārambhiṇa ityavaseyam,
SA15n1234:1386: syādetat-ekārthakaraṇamapi tatra sahakāritvamastu atiśayotpādanalakṣaṇamapītyata āha-“tatra ca” kṣaṇe'ntye “viśeṣasya karttumaśakyatvāt” nātiśayotpādanamapi sahakāritvam |
SA15n1234:1389: na hi tatra ‘ayamanāhitātiśayo bhāgaḥ svahetubhyo jātaḥ,
SA15n1234:1396: yadi bhāvāntaralakṣaṇo viśeṣo bhavet tadā tasyāntyatvameva hīyeta |
SA15n1234:1400: yata evaṃ “tasmānna kāraṇasya” mukhyasya “sahakāribhyaḥ” sakāśād “viśeṣasyotpattiḥ” ityekārthakriyaiva sahakāritvamiti |
SA15n1234:1401: nanvasatyāṃ sahakāribhyo viśeṣotpattau kāryajanane sāmarthyameṣāṃ na yujyata ityata āha-“te samarthāḥ” ityādi |
SA15n1234:1402: yadi hi te svabhāvenāsamarthā utpadyeran tadaiṣāṃ sahakāribhyaḥ sāmarthyotpattirabhyupagamyeta |
SA15n1234:1403: yāvatā “te'ntyāḥ svabhāvenaiva samarthāḥ pratyayāḥ sahitā jāyante” kṣaṇamātravilambino |
SA15n1234:1405: yebhyaścānantarameva kāryamutpadyate” na kālāntareṇa “tatra” teṣvevaṃvidheṣu “ekārthakriyaiva sahakāritvam” nātiśayotpādanalakṣaṇam |
SA15n1234:1407: parasparataścānabhyupagamāt samarthasya janmaivāyuktamiti manvānaḥ paraḥ āha-“samarthaḥ kutaḥ” ityādi |
SA15n1234:1411: kāraṇasya sahakāribhyaḥ sāmarthyamicchatīti tanniṣedhaparaṃ svabhāvata iti vacanam |
SA15n1234:1417: tathāhi-‘idamevaṃrūpaṃ naiva ca’ iti darśanādarśanābhyāṃ vibhajyate |
SA15n1234:1418: tatra yādṛśaḥ kṣityādayastadanyapratyayasannidhāvupalabhyante tādṛśā eva kevalā api |
SA15n1234:1419: tatastadanyasahitā iva kevalā api samarthamaṅkurajanane svaṃ svaṃ kṣaṇāntaramārabheran |
SA15n1234:1420: tataḥ kevalasyāpyaṅkurādijananasvābhāvyādajananācca ‘tatsvabhāvasya jananāt’ityanekānta eveti manyamānaḥ para āha-“tāni” svakāraṇāni kṣitibījādīni “enaṃ” samartham “aparasya” anyasya pratyayasya “sannidhāna eva kiṃ” kasmāt “janayanti” ?
SA15n1234:1422: , sahitānāmeva sarvvadā sambhavāt iti cet āha- “kadācit” kasmiṃścit kāle “anyathā'pi” kevalā api “syuḥ” bhaveyuḥ |
SA15n1234:1423: tathā hi-dṛśyanta evādhyātmikabāhyāḥ kvacit kārye yādṛśā yatsahitāḥ tādṛśā eva tadrahitā apīti |
SA15n1234:1424: janayantu kevalā api sambhavantaḥ samartham, ko doṣaḥ ?
SA15n1234:1425: iti cedāha-“tataśca” kevalānāmapi samarthajanakānāṃ sambhavāt “eko'pi” na kevalamanekaḥ “kvaci” ddeśādau samarthaḥ utpannaḥ kṣitibījādoiraṅkurādikāryaṃ “janayet” yadi tatsvabhāvasyāvaśyaṃ janakatvam |
SA15n1234:1426: na ca kevalo janayati tatsvabhāvasambhave'pi tato'nekāntaḥ iti paraḥ |
SA15n1234:1428: aparaiścāparaiśca kuśūlatadapanetṛpuruṣaprayatnapiṭakādiprakṣepakṣetranayanaprakiraṇādibhiḥ “pratyayai”ryo “yogaḥ” tena kāraṇena “pratikṣaṇaṃ bhinnaśaktayo” na kadācit pūrvvāparakālabhāvina ekaśaktayaḥ aparāparapratyayayogalakṣaṇahetubhede'pyabhinnaśaktitāyāmahetukatvaprasaṅgāt |
SA15n1234:1430: “saṃskārāḥ” sametya sambhūya ca pratyayaiḥ kriyamāṇāḥ “santanvantaḥ” santānena bhavanto “yadyapi kutaścit sāmyād” varṇṇena saṃsthānena anyena vā kenacitprakāreṇa sādṛśyādekākaraparāmarśapratyayajananalakṣaṇāt samānaṃ rūpameṣāmiti “sarūpāḥ” sadṛśāḥ “pratīyante” pratyabhijñāyante “tathāpi” kṛtrimākṛtrimāṇāmiva maṇimuktādīnāmaparāparapratyayogalakṣaṇasāmagrībhedād “bhinna eva” visadṛśa eva na pratyabhijñānavaśādabhinnaḥ tulyarūpa “eṣāṃ” bījādīnāṃ “svabhāvaḥ” yata evaṃ “tena” bhinnasvabhāvatvena bhinnaśaktitayā vā'parāparasāmagrījanyatvena kṣaṇānāṃ siddhyā “kiñcideva” kṣitibījādikaṃ “kasyaci”deva kāryasyāṅkurādestajjananasamarthasya vā “kāraṇam” |
SA15n1234:1432: tathā ca vyagrāṇāṃ kṣitibījādīnāmaṅkurajananasvabhāvatā samarthakṣaṇajānanasvabhāvatā vā nāstyeveti tatsvabhāvasya jananādajanakasya cātatsvabhāvatvādityatra nānekāntaḥ yato yo yatsvabhāvaḥ sa svahetorevotpadyamānaḥ tādṛśo bhavati na punastabhdāve hetvantaramapekṣata ityatrānekāntaḥ syāditi |
SA15n1234:1433: pratyabhijñānasya ca sarūpatāviṣayasya sāmagrībhedādanumitabhinnaśaktisvabhāvatvena bādhyamānatayā prāmāṇyābhāvāt na tataḥ sarūpatāsiddhiḥ kṣaṇakṣayiṇāmiti |
SA15n1234:1435: yoravasthayorvvastubhedo niśceyaḥ ityādinā ekatvaviṣayaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ nirastam |
SA15n1234:1440: kiñcideva kasyacit kāraṇam ityuktam tatra kiṃ kasya kāraṇamiti śakyaparicchedamapyādhyātmikeṣu tāvad darśayannāha-“tatra” ityādi |
SA15n1234:1443: tadādiryeṣāṃ atidūrātyāsannatvādīnāṃ te'vidyamānā yasmin deśe so'vyavadhānādiḥ deśo yasya so'vyavadhānādideśaḥ,
SA15n1234:1444: rūpamindriyaṃ cādī yasya manaskārādeḥ sa rūpendriyādiḥ sa cāsau karaṇakalāpaśca sāmagrīlakṣaṇastathoktaḥ,
SA15n1234:1445: avyavadhānādideśaścāsau rūpendriyadikāraṇakalāpaśca sa“vijñānajanane samartho hetuḥ” nānyaḥ,
SA15n1234:1451: imamevaṃvidhaṃ hetuphalabhāvapratiniyamaṃ niravadyamādhyātmikeṣu darśitam anyatrāpyatidiśannāha-“anena nyāyena” ityādi |
SA15n1234:1452: yo'yamanantaraṃ hetuphalabhāvapratiniyame nyāya uktaḥ so'nyatrā'pi “sarvvatra” draṣṭavyaḥ |
SA15n1234:1453: sarvvatreti vacanāt akṣaṇikeṣvapi pratītirmmā bhūt ityāha-“pratikṣaṇam” ityādi |
SA15n1234:1454: yāḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe'nyāścānyāśca svabhāvabhedānvayinyaḥ śaktayo bhavanti tatrāyamekārthakriyāpratiniyamaḥ sahakāriṇāṃ draṣṭavyaḥ |
SA15n1234:1455: na tu ye sthiraikasvabhāvā bhāvāḥ paraiḥ kalpyante teṣvapi |
SA15n1234:1462: na tu svata eva svabhāvasyānyathātvaṃ sambhavati |
SA15n1234:1463: tataśca sthiraḥ padārtho yadi kāryotpādanasamarthasvabhāvaḥ tato'syākriyā nopapadyate iti sarvvadaiva kuryāt |
SA15n1234:1467: yattu kadācit karoti kadācinna ityetanna labhyate |
SA15n1234:1468: tataścākṣaṇikānāṃ tatkāryakriyāsamarthasvabhāvatve sahitāsahitāvasthayorekarūpatvāt kevalānāmapi tatkāryakriyāprasaṅgena kuta ekārthakriyāpratiniyamalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvaṃ sambhavet ? |
SA15n1234:1470: yadyapi kevalasyapyakṣaṇikasya samarthaḥ svabhāvaḥ tathāpi anyasahitaḥ karoti na kevalaḥ |
SA15n1234:1471: ayamapi hyasya svabhāvaḥ yad-‘anyasahitena svakāryaṃ karttavyam na samarthasvabhāvenāpi satā kevalena’ iti |
SA15n1234:1473: anyasahitenaiva svakāryaṃ karttavyaṃ na kevalena ityetat kevalasyāsamarthasvabhāvatve yujyate nānyatheti manyamānasya praśnaḥ |
SA15n1234:1475: kevalasyāpyakṣaṇikasya samartha eva svabhāvaḥ anyathā'syākṣaṇikataiva hīyeteti |
SA15n1234:1478: sahitasyāvasthāyāmiva yujyata iti sahitasyaiva kriyāmicchatā kevalasyāsamarthasvabhāvataivopagantavyā |
SA15n1234:1479: atha matam-kevalasya yadi śiraśchidyate tathāpi na karotītyata āha “akurvvan” ityādi |
SA15n1234:1480: kāryānumeyaṃ hi sāmarthyaṃ na ca kevalasya kadācidapi kāryakriyā'stīti kathaṃ sāmarthyaṃ kalpyate ? |
SA15n1234:1481: nāyaṃ niyamaḥ yat samarthasvabhāvenāvaśyameva kāryaṃ karttavyam,
SA15n1234:1482: anyathā'pi darśanāt iti manyamāna aha paraḥ-“kuvindādayaḥ” ityādi |
SA15n1234:1484: devānāṃpriyaḥ ṛjuḥ mūrkho va sukhasaṃvarddhitatvāt ramaṇasvabhāvaḥ,
SA15n1234:1488: yo hyanabhiyukto durbuddhiśca sa “kṛtamapi” vastu vismaraṇaprakṛtitvāt punaḥ punaḥ “kārayatīti” punaḥ pratividhāpayati |
SA15n1234:1492: tadevamakṣaṇikasya samarthasvabhāvatve sahitasyaiva kāryakriyāsvabhāvatvavirodhāt kevalasyākriyā'nupapanneti pratipādyopasaṃharannāha-“tasmāt tatsvabhāvasya” kāryakriyāsamarthasya “anyathātvāsambhā(mbha)
SA15n1234:1493: vāt” kadācidasamarthatvābhāvāt “taddharmmaṇaḥ” kāryakriyādharmmaṇaḥ tathābhāvaḥ kāryakriyā “antyāvasthāvat” sahitāvasthāyāmiva “anivāryaḥ |

SA15n1234:1522: yo'sāvakṣaṇiko bhāvaḥ sakaleṣu sahakāriṣu svakāryaṃ karotītīṣyate,
SA15n1234:1524: yena hi kāraṇena tatkāryakriyāsvabhāvatvena tadā karoti tene(nai)
SA15n1234:1527: “kā cānyā mṛgyate yuktiḥ yathā tad dṛśyate tathā ” iti sarvvatreyamapratihatā yuktiriti manyamānaḥ kumārilaḥ prāha- “kurvvan dṛṣṭaḥ” ityādi |
SA15n1234:1531: , prāk tat kurvvanna dṛṣṭaḥ tena na karotītyekārtha[kriyā]pratiniyamaḥ sidhyati akṣaṇikānāmapīti |
SA15n1234:1532: bhāvo hi kāryaṃ karoti tajjananasvabhāvatayā na darśanabalenādṛṣṭasyāpi svakāryakaraṇāt ato nedamuttaraṃ sambadhyata ityupahasannāha- “aho mahāsamarthyam” ityādi |
SA15n1234:1534: yasmādetabhdāvān kāryakaraṇasvabhāvavikalānapi-yadi kāryakaraṇasvabhāvatvād bhāvāḥ kāryaṃ kuryuḥ tadaitadevottaraṃ kiṃ noktam ?
SA15n1234:1535: , yataḥ kāryakaraṇe darśanamuttarīkṛtamiti kṛtvā-“svabhāvamātreṇa” ātmasattāmātreṇa “nānāprakāreṣu vyāpāreṣu niyuṅkte” tat kathaṃ mahāsāmarthyaṃ na syāt ? |
SA15n1234:1536: na cātra me kācidakṣamā kintu “yadi nāma kiñcit” kāraṇaṃ “kathañcid” anādṛtasya vā vyākṣiptasya vā “atra bhavata” iti pūjāvacanam “darśanasya viṣayatāmatikrāmet” tadā “hanta” iti dainyobhdāvanametat,

SA15n1234:1542: “tān paśyantaḥ kevalaṃ jānīmahe” ta ete kārakasvabhāvā iti |

SA15n1234:1551: kintu idamasi praṣṭavyaḥ- “sau['kṣepa]kriyādharmmā svabhāvaḥ kiṃ teṣāṃ tadaivāntyāvasthāyāṃ” samagrāvasthāyāṃ yadanantaraṃ kāryamutpadyate tadaiva “utpannaḥ ?
SA15n1234:1554: atatsvabhāvatve so'kāraka eveti prāguktadoṣabhayāt para āha-“āsīt” |

SA15n1234:1576: nahi svabhāvādanyo bhāvaḥ yatastabhdede'pi na bhidyeta,

SA15n1234:1579: , tasyāparāpekṣasvabhāvabhedalakṣaṇatvāt ityata āha-“nahi sa sāhitye'pi” ityādi |

SA15n1234:1582: tathābhāve hi paramārthataḥ sa eva paraḥ karttā syāt |
