SA15n1234:1586: tataśca nāsyānupakāriṇo bhāvamapekṣeta kāryamiti tadrahitebhya eva sahakāribhyo bhavet |
SA15n1234:1589: tataḥ sarvveṣāmevaṃ svayamakārakatve pararūpeṇāpyakārakatvāt sarvvathā kārakoccheda eveti na kiñcit kutaścit jāyeta |
SA15n1234:1590: tasmāt svarūpeṇaiva bhāvaḥ svakāryasya karttā na pararūpeṇeti nāsyottarasyāvakāśaḥ |
SA15n1234:1592: atha yena svarūpeṇāyaṃ janakastadasya sahitāsahitāvasthayoḥ sarvvadā'sti tadā svarūpaṃ ca svakāryajanakamasya sthirasvabhāvasya prāgapi sahitāvasthāyāstadeva yatsahitāvasthāyāmakṣepakriyāsvabhāvamiti tasmāt na kathaṃcit kāryakriyāvirāmaḥ |
SA15n1234:1593: athavā kadācit paro brūyāt svahetubhirevāyaṃ pratyayāntarāpekṣaḥ svakāryajananasvabhāvo janita iti kevalo na karoti |
SA15n1234:1595: pratyayāntarāpekṣasvakāryajananasvabhāvatāyāḥ sarvvadā bhāvāt ityata āha- “nahi sa sāhitye'pi” ityādi |
SA15n1234:1596: svarūpeṇaivāsya kartṛtvāt tasya ca prāgapi bhāvāt pratyayāntarāpekṣāyāśca tato labhyasyātmātiśayasyābhāvenāyogāt upakāralakṣaṇatvādasya,
SA15n1234:1598: kevalasya kāryakaraṇamanivāryamiti akurvvataḥ kathaṃ sahitāvasthāyā na bhedaḥ syāt ? iti bhāvaḥ |
SA15n1234:1599: pratyayāntarāpekṣasvakāryakaraṇasvabhāva ityapi pararūpeṇākārakasya pratyayāntarasannidhānopalakṣitakāle kārakatvaṃ na prāgityayamarthaḥ |
SA15n1234:1600: tataśca kadācit kāryakriyāsvabhāvo na sarvvadā iti brūvatā kathaṃ sarvvadā kāryajananasvabhāvatā'syoktā bhavati ? |
SA15n1234:1601: nanvevaṃ svabhāvabheda evāsya tadatatkālayoḥ samarthitaḥ syāt |
SA15n1234:1606: ‘te samarthā eva svabhāvato'ntyāḥ pratyayāḥ saha jāyante kṣaṇikā yeṣāṃ prākpaścātpṛthagbhāvo nāsti’ ityatra |
SA15n1234:1607: “sa kathamekakṣaṇabhāvī” ekasminnevāntye kṣaṇe bhavanaśīlaḥ “anyathā bhavet” antyakṣaṇāt prāk paścāt pṛthagvā bhavet ?
SA15n1234:1608: “yaśca” anyathā “bhavati sa” evāntyakṣaṇabhāvī sahakārisantānopakṛtasvabhāvo'kṣepakriyādharmmā “na bhavatīti nāyam” akṣaṇīkapakṣoditaḥ “prasaṅgaḥ” kṣaṇikapakṣe |
SA15n1234:1611: kārako'ntyaḥ akārakastadanyaḥ tayoryaḥ “svabhāvaḥ” sa bhinno'pi bhedāvivakṣayaikatvenoktaḥ |
SA15n1234:1614: tena kārakākārakayoryau svabhāvau tayorekatra dharmmiṇi virodhāt |
SA15n1234:1615: tathā tayoḥ svabhāvayorjanakau yau hetū-ekaḥ kārakasvabhāvajanako'nyaścākārakasvabhāvajanakaḥ- tayorapyekatra dharmmiṇi virodhāt,
SA15n1234:1617: akārakasvabhāvajanakahetorutpannasyākārakasya svabhāvasyānyatvāt “yaśca bhavati sa eva na bhavatīti nāyaṃ prasaṅga” iti |
SA15n1234:1619: aparastvanyathā śirarūpeṣvekārthakriyāpratiniyamaṃ kalpitavān tamupanyasyati “yo'pi manyate” ityādi |
SA15n1234:1625: sa evaṃvidhasvabhāvo na kadācit sāhityaṃ svakāryakaraṇe'pekṣate yato'nyaḥ sahito'nyaśca kevalaḥ kārakākārakasvabhāvabhedāt syāt |
SA15n1234:1626: sa tarhi sarvvadā tatsvabhāvaḥ kāryaṃ kinna karoti ? iti cet |
SA15n1234:1632: tataḥ tadātmanaḥ kāryasya sahitebhya eva bhāvādekārthakriyālakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvamakṣaṇikānāmapyupapadyata iti |
SA15n1234:1633: siddhāntavādī pūrvvadoṣānatikramamasya darśayannāha-“tasyāpi” evaṃvādinaḥ “kathaṃ sa” nityābhimato bhāvaḥ “kevalaḥ karotyeva” ‘akṣepakriyādharmmaiva sa tasya svabhāvaḥ’ iti vacanāt |
SA15n1234:1636: tasmāt kevalānna bhavatīti “tadavastho virodho” yaḥ pūrvvamuktaḥ |
SA15n1234:1637: tathāhi-yadyakṣepakriyādharmmā tadā'vaśyamanena kāryaṃ kartavyam na cedavaśyaṃ karoti kathamakṣepakriyāsvabhāvaḥ |
SA15n1234:1638: akṣepeṇā kāryadarśanādakṣepakriyāsvabhāvatā'vagamyate nānyathā iti parābhiprāyāśaṅkayā''ha- “na kevalaḥ” ityādi |
SA15n1234:1639: naivaṃ mayoktaṃ kevalaḥ karotyeveti kintvakṣepakriyāsvabhāva iti |
SA15n1234:1641: yadi karotyeveti neṣyate kathamakṣepakriyāsvabhāva iti kathyate ? |
SA15n1234:1642: atha tathocyate tathā nanvetadevānena “vacasā paridīpitam” abhihitaṃ bhavati |
SA15n1234:1646: yastu nāvaśyaṃ karoti sa kathaṃ tadrūpaḥ syat ? |
SA15n1234:1649: yataḥ “kāryaṃ” cāyamakṣaṇiko bhāvaḥ “kevalo'pi samarthaḥ san paraṃ” pratyayāntaram “apekṣamāṇaṃ kathamupekṣeta ?” naiva |
SA15n1234:1651: āha- “paraṃ” pratyayāntaram “anādṛtya” tiraskṛtya etat kāryaṃ “prasahya” haṭhāt “kuryāt” |
SA15n1234:1653: iti cet, āha- “evaṃ hi” paramanādṛtya haṭhāt svakāryaṃ “kurvvatā'nena” kevalenāpi samarthena satā yat tadātmanaḥ kevalasyāpi “sāmarthyaṃ” tad “darśitaṃ” prakāśitaṃ bhavati |
SA15n1234:1654: anyathā'nyasahitasyaiva karaṇāt kevalasya ca kadācidapyakaraṇāt na ‘ayaṃ kevalo'pi samarthaḥ’ iti pareṣāṃ buddhiḥ syāt |
SA15n1234:1657: kāryāpekṣayā'pi virodhasya tādavasthyaṃ darśayannāha- “kāryaṃ param” ityādi |
SA15n1234:1658: kāryasya parāpekṣāṃ brūvan kevalāt kāraṇādanutpattimasya kathayasi,
SA15n1234:1659: ‘sa kevalo'pi samarthaḥ’ itīdaṃ vadaṃstataḥ kevalādutpattiṃ kāryasya brūṣe |
SA15n1234:1661: tat evaikasmāt kāraṇādutpattyanutpattī parasparaviruddhe “kathamekatra” kāryākhye dharmmiṇi “syātām ?
SA15n1234:1663: ekatra te brūvāṇo ‘mātā ca vandhyā ca’ ityanena sadṛśaṃ brūṣa iti na pūrvoktadoṣānmucyase,
SA15n1234:1664: yata evamapi brūvāṇo viruddhameva brūte na ca lakṣayati “tat” tasmāt “ayam” akṣaṇikavādī kṣaṇikapakṣasyānavadyatayā tadvādināṃ nirddoṣatāsampatsu amarṣalakṣaṇerṣyā eva śalyaṃ antarduḥkhahetutvāt tena vitudyamānāni vyathyamānāni marmmāṇi yasya so “'yamīrṣyāśalyavitudyamānamarmā” varāko'svasthacittatayā viruddhābhidhānamapyalakṣayan “viklavam” ākulaṃ pūrvvāparāsambaddhaṃ “vikrośati” viroditi “iti” kṛtvā asvasthacittavacaneṣvanādarāt taddoṣobhdāvanasya sutarāṃ duḥkhotpādanena kṣatakṣāraniṣekatulyatvāt “upekṣāmeva” vipaścitānāṃ (ścitāṃ)
SA15n1234:1666: tadevamakṣaṇikeṣu na kathañcidekārthakriyāpratiniyamalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvaṃ sambhavatīti pratipādyopasaṃharannāha- “tasmādidam” ityādi |
SA15n1234:1667: yeṣāṃ hi sthirarūpatayā pṛthagapi bhāvaḥ sambhavati teṣāmakṣaṇikānāṃ “pṛthak” kevalānāṃ “kāryakaraṇasambhavena” hetunā sahaiva kurvantīti sahakāritvaniyamāyogādidamekārthakriyālakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvaṃ kṣaṇikānāmeva |
SA15n1234:1670: nanu atiśayotpādanalakṣaṇamapi sahakāritvaṃ bhāveṣu dṛśyate tat kathamuktaṃ prāk ‘sarvvatra naivātiśayotpādanaṃ sahakriyā,
SA15n1234:1671: kiṃ tarhi bahūnāmekārthakaraṇameva’ ityata āha- “yatra tu santānopakāreṇa” ityādi |
SA15n1234:1672: ekārthakriyālakṣaṇameva sahakāritvaṃ sarvvatra na kvacidatiśayotpādanaṃ sambhavati |
SA15n1234:1673: yatra tu santānopakāreṇa pūrvvapūrvvapratyayebhyo viśiṣṭaviśiṣṭatarottarottarakṣaṇajanena bhāvāḥ sahakāriṇo vivakṣitakāryasya hetutāṃ pratipadyante-yathā taṇḍulādibhya odanādijanmani dahanodakādayaḥ,
SA15n1234:1674: bījādibhyaścāṅkurādijanmani pṛthivyādayaḥ - tatra viśeṣotpādanaṃ pratyayānāṃ sahakriyocyate loke |
SA15n1234:1676: tya purvvottarakṣaṇayorekatvādhyavasāyena tasyaivāyamatiśaya iti na dravyāśrayeṇa |
SA15n1234:1678: pūrvvapūrvvakṣaṇebhyastu svahetupariṇāmopanidhidharmmabhya uttarottaraviśeṣotpattau pūrvvakāraṇakalāpasyaikārthakriyālakṣaṇameva tatra paramārthataḥ sahakāritvamiti na kācit kṣatiriti |
SA15n1234:1681: yadi tarhi kṣanike taṇḍulādidravye viśeṣo notpadyate,
SA15n1234:1683: tato yathā parasparato viśeṣamanāsādayanto'pi kṣaṇikāḥ sahitā eva kurvvanti na kevalāḥ,
SA15n1234:1686: na ca śakyaṃ vaktum-yo yasya prāgakārakaḥ svabhāvaḥ sa paścādapīti |
SA15n1234:1689: arthā na pratibhāntīti gṛhyante nendriyaiḥ punaḥ ||” iti |
SA15n1234:1691: viśeṣānutpattau sannidhānasyāpyasannidhānatulyatvāt dahanādibhāve'pi taṇḍulādibhyo naudanajanma syāt |
SA15n1234:1692: tathā prabhāsvarādapavarakaṃ praviṣṭasya yadīndriyaṃ svopakāribhyo'tiśayaṃ krameṇa na pratipadyate tadā prāgiva paścādapyarthapratipattiṃ naiva janayet |
SA15n1234:1693: tasmādyadasambhavi kāryaṃ yatra dṛśyate tasya tato'nyatvameva,
SA15n1234:1694: śālibījādiva kodravabījasyeti niratiśayādanyatvameva sātiśayatayā tatkāryakāriṇa iti |
SA15n1234:1695: evaṃ tāvad yatra sahakāribhyaḥ krameṇa kāryaṃ bhavati tatrātiśayotpādanalakṣaṇamaupacārikaṃ sahakāritvamekārthakriyālakṣaṇameva tu mukhyaṃ tatrāpīti pratipāditam |
SA15n1234:1696: yatra tvakṣepeṇaivārthasannidhimātreṇa sahakāriṇaḥ kāryaṃ kurvvanti kiṃ tatrāpi santānāśrayamatiśayotpādanamasti ?
SA15n1234:1698: ‘ye hyavyavadhānādideśā indriyādayaḥ svahetubhyo jātāsteṣvavilambitakāriṣu na viśeṣotpattiḥ parasparataḥ sambhavati,
SA15n1234:1700: yadi na viśeṣotpattiḥ tadā kathaṃ nirvviśeṣā jñānasya kāraṇībhavanti ?
SA15n1234:1701: ityata āha- “tatra yathāsvaṃ” yasya ye ātmīyāḥ pratyayāḥ taiḥ,
SA15n1234:1702: “parasparopasarppaṇavyavadhānādivirahāderāśrayabhūtairye jātāḥ” yogyaścāsāvatyāsannatvātiviprakarṣavirahād deśaśca sa ādiryasyāvyavahitadeśādeḥ tatrāvasthānamavasthā yeṣāṃ “te saha svabhāvaniṣpattyā” svabhāvaniṣpattirvvidyata ityeva kṛtvā “jñānahetutāṃ pratipadyante” tatra kiṃ parasparato viśeṣotpattyā prārthitayā ? |
SA15n1234:1703: yadi hi svahetubhya eva parasparopasarppaṇādyāśrayebhyaḥ svakāryajananakṣamā yogyadeśādyavasthānalakṣaṇaviśeṣayogino notpadyeran,
SA15n1234:1706: yata evaṃ “iti” tasmāt “tatra”teṣu akṣepakāriṣvindriyādiṣu “ekārthakriyaiva” mukhyaṃ “sahakāritvaṃ” na santānāśrayeṇa vyavasthāpyamānamatiśayotpādanalakṣaṇaṃ gauṇamiti |
SA15n1234:1707: atha viśeṣotpādanalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvaṃ kathaṃ na vyavasthāpyate ? |
SA15n1234:1708: tadapi hi loke pratītatvād vyavasthāpanīyamevetyata āha- “yatra tu” kārye nāvyavadhānādideśopanipātamātreṇaivendriyādaya iva sahakāriṇaḥ pratyayatāṃ pratipadyante,
SA15n1234:1709: kintu vivakṣitakāryotpādānuguṇaṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ prakṛṣyamāṇaṃ viśeṣamutpādayantaḥ “tatra” kālakṣepabhāvini kārye karttavye “hetusantāno”'parāparakṣaṇabhāvalakṣaṇa ātmātiśayāsādanārthaṃ sahakārīṇi pratyayāntarāṇyapekṣate,
SA15n1234:1712: paramārthatastu tatrāpi pūrvvaḥ pūrvvaḥ pratyayakalāpa uttarottarakāryotpādānuguṇe viśiṣṭakṣaṇe pratiniyata ityekārthakriyālakṣaṇameva sahakāritvamanubhavati |
SA15n1234:1714: , yataḥ krameṇa kāryaṃ nirvvarttayantītyata āha- “tatra svarasataḥ” ityādi |
SA15n1234:1715: “tatra” tasmin hetusantāne ye hetava upādānakāraṇākhyāḥ ye ca pratyayāḥ sahakārisaṃjñitāsteṣāṃ ye pūrvve prathama upanipātakṣaṇāḥ teṣāṃ vināśahetvanapekṣitayā svarasato nivṛttau satyāṃ tebhya eva svarasato nivarttamānebhyaḥ prathamakṣaṇebhyaḥ kāryotpādānuguṇena viśeṣeṇa viśiṣṭasya kṣaṇasyotpattiḥ tebhyo'nuguṇataraviśeṣavatāṃ tṛtīyakṣaṇānāṃ tebhyonuguṇatamaviśeṣavatāṃ caturthakṣaṇānām;
SA15n1234:1716: evaṃ yāvadatyantātiśayavānantyaḥ kāraṇakalāpo jātaḥ tataḥ kāryasyotpattiḥ ityevaṃ sahakāribhyaḥ svabhāvāntarapratilambhaḥ,
SA15n1234:1720: yat samutpannaviśeṣamanantaroktena prakāreṇa kāraṇaṃ antyasāmagrīkṣaṇalakṣaṇaṃ tato'ṅkurādikāryotpattau iṣyamāṇāyāṃ tasyaiva viśeṣasyādyasya kāryotpādanānuguṇasya yaḥ krameṇābhivarddhamānaḥ kāryasya janaka iṣyate tasyaiva utpattirnna syāt prathamakṣaṇopanipātināṃ parasparato viśeṣānāsādanāt kṣaṇānāmavivekāt anabhyupagamācca |
SA15n1234:1721: parasparato'navāptaviśeṣā eva kāryotpādanānuguṇaṃ viśeṣamārapsyanta iti cedāha- “aviśiṣṭāda” viśiṣṭebhyaḥ parasparato “viśeṣasya” kāryotpādānuguṇasyotpattāviṣyamāṇāyāṃ “kāryasya” aṅkurādeḥ syāt,
SA15n1234:1723: tataśca parasparato viśeṣotpādānapekṣiṇa eva sahakāriṇaḥ kāryaṃ kurvvīran |
SA15n1234:1725: iti cet, āha- “tena” yena kṣaṇikā api parasparato viśeṣotpādā'napekṣā eva svakāryaṃ kurvvanti ekakāryapratiniyamalakṣaṇaṃ ca sahakāritvaṃ pratipadyante tena kāraṇena “akṣaṇikānāmapi kāraṇatā syāt,
SA15n1234:1726: apekṣaṇīyebhyaḥ svabhāvātiśayotpatiśca na syāt” ityakṣaṇikavādī kṣaṇikapakṣeṇa svapakṣasya sāmyamāpādayati | yadāha-
SA15n1234:1728: ajñatā vā yataḥ sarvvaṃ kṣaṇikeṣvapi tatsamam ||
SA15n1234:1731: iti | tatraitat syāt prathamakṣaṇe'pi kṣitibījādayaḥ parasparataḥ samutpannaviśeṣā eva sannidhīyante-
SA15n1234:1733: iti nyāyāddhi dūradeśavarttināmapi hetuphalabhāvāt ityāśaṅkayāha-“atha sahakāriṇā” ityādi |
SA15n1234:1734: sahakāriṇaḥ parasparasamparkkavikalā api vastudharmmatayaivānyonyamupakurvvantīti śahakāriṇā kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣajananāya kṛtaviśeṣa eva samparkkakāla upatiṣṭheta,
SA15n1234:1738: atha naivaṃ sahakāriṇaḥ parasparasya kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣaṇimittamaparaṃ viśeṣaṃ kurvvanti,
SA15n1234:1739: svabhāvata eva tatra teṣāṃ yogyatvāt ityata āha-“na ca” ityādi |
SA15n1234:1740: naiva hi sahakāriṇaḥ kṣitibījādayaḥ parasparasya kāryotpādānuguṇo yo viśeṣaḥ tadutpādane “nityaṃ” sarvvakālaṃ yogyāvasthā “yena” yogyāvasthatvena “nityānuṣaktaḥ” nityānubaddhaḥ “eṣāṃ” kṣitibījādīnāṃ kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣajanako viśeṣaḥ syāt yataḥ ‘aviśiṣṭād viśeṣotpattau kāryasyāpi syāt’ ityetadapi parihriyeta |
SA15n1234:1742: teṣāṃ kṣitibījādīnāmupāye-yogyadeśopanipāte kāryavyaktidarśanāt apāye ca-parasparasamparkkavirāme kāryānutpattidarśanāt |
SA15n1234:1743: yadi hi kāryotpādanuguṇaviśeṣotpādane sarvvadā yogyāvasthāḥ syuḥ tadā so'pi viśeṣaḥ sarvvadā syat |
SA15n1234:1744: tatastatparamparābhāvi kāryamiti tadupāyāpāyayoḥ kāryasyotpattyanutpattī na syātām |
SA15n1234:1746: yataḥ sahakāriṇā pṛthagavasthitenānavasthābhayāt kṛtaviśeṣo nopatiṣṭhate parasparataśca prathamasamparkkakṣaṇabhāvināṃ nopeyate yujyate vā |
SA15n1234:1747: tena kāraṇenādyo viśeṣaḥ kāryotpādānuguṇaḥ sahakāribhyaḥ samānakālatayā nirupakārasya kṣitibījādeḥ “notpadyate”,
SA15n1234:1749: tena samagrāvasthāvat sarvveṣāṃ vyagrāvasthābhāvināmapi kṣaṇānāmaviśeṣāt tajjananasvabhāvatve'pyajananāt samagrāvasthāyāmeva jananād |
SA15n1234:1750: yathā kṣaṇikānāmekārthakriyāpratiniyamalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvaṃ tathā sthirasvabhāvānāmapi bhaviṣyatīti kṣinasarvvopāyo'kṣaṇikavādī sāmyamevātura iva bahumanyamānastatraiva bharaṃ kṛtavān |
SA15n1234:1751: siddhāntavādī bhaṅgyā paramupahasannāha-“nāsmākaṃ punaḥ punaḥ” ityādi |
SA15n1234:1752: yadi punaḥ punarvvacane'pi lokasya nyāyapratītirbhavati śataśo'pi brūmaḥ |
SA15n1234:1754: nahi parārthapravṛttānāmasmākaṃ punaḥ punarabhidhāne kaścidudvego bhavati |
SA15n1234:1755: evaṃvādinaśca śāstrakṛtaḥ kvacit prakārāntareṇa tamevārthaṃ sphuṭīkurvvato ye punaruktatāaprihārāya yatante sa teṣāmasthānapariśrama eva |
SA15n1234:1756: yadi nodvego hanta tarhyucyatām ityata āha- “na viśeṣotpādanādeva” ityādi |
SA15n1234:1757: naiva viśeṣotpādanāt sahakāriṇāṃ sahakāritvaṃ paramārthataḥ kvacit sambhavati,
SA15n1234:1758: yataḥ prathamakṣaṇabhāvināṃ bījādīnāṃ tadabhāvāt kāryotpādānuguṇe viśeṣe karttavye sahakāritāvirahaḥ syāt |
SA15n1234:1759: kintvekārthākriyaiva sahakāriṇāṃ pāramārthikaṃ sahakāritvaṃ pūrvvoktābhiryuktibhiḥ sambhāvyate |
SA15n1234:1760: sā ca prathamamasamparkkabhājāmastyeveti kiṃ na sahakāriṇaḥ syuḥ ? |
SA15n1234:1761: para āha- sā'pyekārthakriyā na bhavet parasparato viśeṣarahitānām |
SA15n1234:1762: yadi punaḥ parasparato viśeṣarahitānāmapi tadekārthakriyā'ṅgikriyate tadā pratyekaṃ tadavasthāyāṃ tadutpādanasāmarthyābhyupagamāt tadavasthāyāmiva pṛthagapi sā bhavet |
SA15n1234:1763: tathāhi-te tadavasthāyāmapi parasparato nirvviśeṣā eva kurvvanti |
SA15n1234:1764: teṣāṃ pṛthagapi tadviśeṣakriyā kathamiva na prasajyeta ? |
SA15n1234:1767: iti cet; “tathā ca” kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣasya pṛthakkaraṇaprasaṅge sati “tasmād viśeṣād bhavanaśīlam” aṅkurādi “kāryamapi” viśeṣavat kevalāt sahakāriṇaḥ syāt iti cenmanyase,
SA15n1234:1769: tathā hi- saṃhatāsaṃhatāvasthayonnirviśeṣā eva kṣaṇakṣayiṇo bhāvā iti yaducyate tat kiṃ tāvadviśeṣamātrāpekṣayā ?
SA15n1234:1778: etāvattu syāt- kaścid viśeṣaḥ kvacit kārye'nuguṇo na sarvvaḥ sarvatreti |
SA15n1234:1780: ‘aparāparapratyayogena pratikṣaṇaṃ bhinnaśaktayaḥ saṃskārāḥ santanvanto yadyapi kutaścit sāmyāt sarūpāḥ pratīyante,
SA15n1234:1784: evaṃ ca ’nāsmākaṃ punaḥ punarvvacana’ ityatra dviḥ punargrahaṇaṃ yujyate |
SA15n1234:1785: yathā yena prakāreṇa bhāvasantāne viśeṣasyotpattiḥ [ta]dapyuktam ‘tatra svarasataḥ pūrvvakṣaṇanirodhe tebhya eva viśiṣṭakṣaṇotpādād viśeṣotpattiḥ’ iti |
SA15n1234:1786: atha kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣajanakaviśeṣāpekṣayā prāgvat prathamasamparkkabhājaḥ parasparato nirvviśeṣā ityabhimataṃ tadapyayuktam |
SA15n1234:1787: yataḥ kāryotpādānuguṇasya viśeṣasya janakāḥ kṣitibījādayaḥ kīdṛśāḥ ye vyavadhānādirahitatvenopanipātinaḥ |
SA15n1234:1788: tabhdāva eva tasya bhāvāt etāvanmātranibandhanatvācca janakaṃ vya(kavya)vasthāyāḥ |
SA15n1234:1789: te ca tathāvidhāḥ sarvadā na bhavantīti kathaṃ pṛthagapi kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣārambha eṣāṃ syāt ?
SA15n1234:1790: , yataḥ kevalānāmapi kāryakriyā prasajyeta tad darśayati- yogyo deśo yeṣāṃ te yogyadeśāḥ,
SA15n1234:1796: naivaṃvidhāḥ sarvvadā bījādaya iti kathameṣāṃ pṛthagapi tathāvidhaviśeṣārambhaḥ syāt ? |
SA15n1234:1797: etadapi prāgevoktam ‘tatra yo'vyavadhānādideśo rūpendriyādikalāpaḥ sa vijñānajanane samartho hetuḥ’ iti vacanāt |
SA15n1234:1799: ihāpi tatra yo'vyavadhānādideśaḥ kṣitibījādikalāpaḥ sa kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣajanane samartho heturiti pratīyata eva |
SA15n1234:1800: sa ca tathāvidhoviśeṣaḥ sarvvadā na bhavati,
SA15n1234:1803: etadapi pūrvvamevoktamityāha-teṣāṃ ca kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣa[janane] viśeṣavatāṃ yata utpattistadapyuktamasakṛdeva ‘yasteṣāṃ parasparopasarppaṇādyāśrayaḥ pratyayaviśeṣaḥ sa taddhetujanane samartho hetuḥ’ iti |
SA15n1234:1804: tathā ‘yathāsvaṃ pratyayaiḥ parasparopasarppaṇādyāśrayairye yogyadeśādyavasthā jātāste saha svabhāvaniṣpattyā jñānahetutāṃ pratipadyanta’ ityanena,
SA15n1234:1808: na ca svahetuta eva sañjātaviśeṣāṇāṃ bhāve parasparatastadāśaṃsā,
SA15n1234:1810: teṣāṃ ca kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣajanakānāṃ pratyayānāṃ pratyekaṃ sāmarthye'pi khaṇḍaśaḥ kāryotpādāyogāt sakalasyaiva pratyekaṃ karaṇāt |
SA15n1234:1811: yathā kevalānāmakriyā kartṛviśeṣasyāvyavadhānādideśakṣitībījādikalāpasya pṛthagekaikasya samarthasya bhāvasyābhāvādityetadapyasakṛdevoktam ‘teṣāṃ ca na pūrvvaṃ na paścāt na pṛthagbhāva iti samarthānapi pūrvvāparapṛthagbhāvabhāvino doṣā nopalīyante’ ityādivacanāt |
SA15n1234:1812: tatastathāvidhaviśeṣasya svopādānamātranibandhanasyānabhyupagamena kevalānāmaprasaṅgāt kutaḥ kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣārambhadvārakaṃ kāryamapi syāditi ? |
SA15n1234:1813: kutaḥ punarayaṃ kāmacāro labhyate yadaṅkurādikāryaṃ sahakāriṇaḥ parasparasya kāryotpādānuguṇāṃ viśeṣaparamparāṃ janayantaḥ kurvvanti,
SA15n1234:1814: kāryotpādānuguṇaṃ tu viśeṣaṃ vyavadhānādirahitadeśopanipātamātreṇetyata āha- “kāryadvaividhyaṃ ca yasmāt tasmādevaṃ vibhajyate” |
SA15n1234:1816: ata āha-sahakāribhiravyavadhānādideśairanantaraṃ sañjanitāḥ parasparasya prāgavasthāpekṣaviśiṣṭakṣaṇabhāvalakṣaṇā ye viśeṣāstatparamparayā uttarottaraviśiṣṭaviśiṣṭatarādikṣaṇabhavarūpayā utpattirddharmmo yasya tadātmakamekaṃ kāryam |
SA15n1234:1817: anyacca tadviparītaṃ yat sahakārisannidhimātreṇa bhavati na parasparakṛtāṃ viśeṣaparamparāmapekṣate |
SA15n1234:1826: kāraṇamapi kiñcit svasannidhimātreṇa kāryajananasvabhāvaṃ svakāraṇebhya eva bhavati,
SA15n1234:1831: śālyaṅkuraśca tabdījajanyasvabhāvo na yavādībījajanyasvabhāva iti na bhāvānāṃ svahetubalāyātāḥ pramāṇādhigatāḥ svabhāvāḥ paryanuyojyāḥ |
SA15n1234:1832: ye tu yajjananasvabhāvāḥ pramāṇato'dhigatāḥ te kiṃ sarvvadaiva tatsvabhāvāḥ ?
SA15n1234:1835: tatra sarvvadā tatsvabhāvatve paścādiva prāgapi tatkāryakriyāprasaṅgena pararūpeṇākārakasya bhinnasvabhāvatā kārakākārakāvasthayoḥ śāliyavabījādīnāmiva tattvacintakairūcyate |
SA15n1234:1836: sadṛśāparabhāvanibandhanaṃ caikatayā pratyabhijñānaṃ lūnapunarjāteṣviva keśanakhādiṣu ityatra virodhābhāvāditi |
SA15n1234:1839: sati “sahakāribhyaḥ” kṣitibījādibhyasteṣāṃ parasparasantānopakāramapekṣate yat kāraṇamantyāvasthāprāptaṃ tasya yat kāryamaṅkurādikaṃ tajjanmanimittaṃ “sahakāriṇāṃ” prathamakṣaṇāntaraṃ viśiṣṭadvitīyakṣaṇabhāvarūpo yo viśeṣaḥ kāryotpādānuguṇaḥ “ādyo” bhavati “sa teṣāṃ” sahakāriṇāṃ prathamasamparkkabhājāṃ parasparakṛto yo viśeṣastajjanmā na bhavati parasparopasarppaṇādyāśrayādeva pratyayaviśeṣāt tasya bhāvāt |
SA15n1234:1840: tataḥ kāryotpādānuguṇādādyād viśeṣāt prathamakṣaṇopanipātibhiḥ sahakāribhiranyataḥ samāsāditaviśeṣaiḥ janitāt tatprabhṛti “ye viśeṣāḥ” prakṛṣyamāṇataduttarottarakṣaṇabhāvalakṣaṇā jāyante “te tajjanmānaḥ” sahakārikṛtaviśeṣajanmānaḥ |
SA15n1234:1841: kutaḥ ? “tatprakṛtitvāt” tasyādyasya viśeṣasya parasparopasarppaṇādyāśrayāt pratyayaviśeṣādāsāditatadanukūlaviśeṣaiḥ sahakāribhiḥ parasparopakāranirapekṣairjanyasvabhāvatvāt,
SA15n1234:1844: atha sahakāriṇā kṣityādinā kuśūlādyavastho'pi bījādiḥ tenāpi kṣityādiḥ kṛtaviśeṣa evopatiṣṭhetānavasthaivaṃ syāt iti |
SA15n1234:1846: tatra yaduktaṃ pareṇa ‘yathā prathamasamprarkkabhājaḥ kṣitibījādayaḥ parasparasya viśeṣamanādadhānāḥ kāryotpādānuguṇaṃ viśeṣaṃ janayanti,
SA15n1234:1847: tathā sthirarūpā api bhāvāḥ tadekakāryapratiniyatāḥ parasparakṛtaviśeṣanirapekṣā eva bhaviṣyanti’ iti,
SA15n1234:1849: kṣaṇikavadakṣaniko'pi yadi kāryaṃ karoti karotu nāma |
SA15n1234:1851: kintu yena svabhāvena kāryaṃ karoti sa yadi “avilambitakāryakartṛdharmmā” akṣepeṇa karotītyevaṃśīlo dharmmo yasya sa tathoktaḥ,
SA15n1234:1852: tadā “pṛthagbhāvasya sambhāvāt kevalo'pi” na kevalaṃ sahitaḥ “tathā syāt” tatkāryakārakaḥ syādityuktaṃ bahuśaḥ |
SA15n1234:1853: “atatsvabhāvastu” akṣepakartṛsvabhāvavikalastu “tadā'pi” sahitāvasthāyāmapi prāgvat “akāraka eva” pararūpeṇa kartṛtvasya pūrvvameva niṣedhāt |
SA15n1234:1854: tadevamekārthakriyayā viśeṣotpādanena cākṣaṇikānāṃ sahakāritvaṃ niṣidhyopasaṃharannāha- “tasmāt” ityādi |
SA15n1234:1855: dvividhasyāpi sahakāritvasyāyogānnaivākṣaṇikasya kaścit sahakārīti kevalo'pi svakāryaṃ kuryāditi sahakāripratyayāpekṣasyākṣaṇikasya hetutāṃ bruvāṇasya kiṃ yuktamiti darśayannāha- “prāyastu” ityādi |
SA15n1234:1856: yo hi sthirahetuvādī tasya yadi sa hetuḥ pratyayāntarāṇyapekṣya kāryaṃ karoti tadā “vyaktam” avaśyaṃ tasya sthirasya hetoḥ pratyayāntarāpekṣakārakasya svabhāvāntarasyotpattiriti |
SA15n1234:1858: yataḥ sahakāriṇāṃ yaḥ “saṃghātaḥ” sannipātaḥ “tatsthāyī” tatra varttamāno bhāvasantānaḥ “prāyaḥ” bāhulyena “sahakāripratyayairupajanitaviśeṣaḥ” san “svakāryaṃ kurvvan dṛṣṭo bījādivat” tasmādevaṃ vibhajyate |
SA15n1234:1862: tasyaiva hyakārakasya tadātmā kārakaḥ svabhāvo na yujyate na tvatadātmā |
SA15n1234:1866: atha matam-kārakasvabhāvāntarotpattiriṣyeta yadi sthirasya hetoḥ prāgapi kārakasvabhāvo na syat |
SA15n1234:1867: tasya tu prāgapi bhāvāt pratyayāntarāpekṣā tadutpattirapyayukteti ata āha- “kārakasya” ityādi |
SA15n1234:1868: yadi hi samagrāvasthāyāḥ prāgapi kārakasvabhāvo bhavet tadā'syākriyā na yujyate,
SA15n1234:1873: yadi ca pratyayāntarairapyasau na kriyeta tat kimiti mudhaiva tānyapekṣate ? iti |
SA15n1234:1875: tadevaṃ ‘tatsvabhāvasya jananāt’ tyasya ‘yo yatsvabhāvaḥ sa svahetorevotpadyamānaḥ tādṛśo bhavati punastabhdāve hetvantaramapekṣate’ ityasyānekāntaparihārāyoktasya prakārāntareṇānekānte ubhdāvite tatparijihīrṣayā “aparāparapratyayayogena” ityādyabhihitam |
SA15n1234:1876: tatra yena nyāyena kṣaṇikānāṃ hetuphalasvabhāvaḥ tasyākṣaṇikeṣvasambhavaṃ pratipādayituṃ prāsaṅgikaṃ yadupakrāntaṃ tat parisamāpayya prakṛtamanubadhnannāha- “tasmād yo yadātmā” ityādi |
SA15n1234:1877: yadi svabhāvenāsthitidharmmaṇo bhāvasya na nāśakāraṇaiḥ prayojanaṃ svabhāvena sthitidharmmaṇo bhaviṣyatītyata āha- “sthitidharmmaṇo'pi” ityādi |
SA15n1234:1878: sthitidharmmaṇo'pi hi naiva nāśakāraṇaiḥ kiñcit prayojanam |
SA15n1234:1879: tasya svahetubhyaḥ samupajāto yaḥ sthiraḥ svabhavaḥ tadanyathātvasyāsthirātmatāpatteḥ kenacit karttumaśakyatvāt |
SA15n1234:1880: kāmaṃ hi bhāvāḥ svayaṃ na bhaveyuḥ |
SA15n1234:1881: na tu santa eva svaṃ svabhāvaṃ parityajanti |
SA15n1234:1882: atha sthitidharmmaṇo'pyanyathātvapratipattiriṣyate tadā'nyathātvapratipattau vā “tatsvabhāva eva” sthitidharmmaiva “na syāt” ātmabhūtasyāsthitidharmmaṇaḥ svabhāvasya paścāt sambhave prāgapyabhāvāyogāt |
SA15n1234:1886: tathā ca sati “pūrvva” eva “vikalpaḥ” svabhāvenāsthitidharmmā bhāva iti |
SA15n1234:1890: anyathā nivṛttyayogādityata āha- “yaśca parasmāt” nāśahetoḥ sthitidharmmaṇaḥ sata “anyathābhāvaḥ” asthitidharmmatālakṣaṇo bhavati,
SA15n1234:1891: sa pūrvvakāt sthitidharmmaṇaḥ svahetusamubhdūtāt svabhāvāt “aparaḥ” anyaḥ “svabhāvastasminniṣpanne” paścā[jjanya]tvād bhinnahetukatvācca “kathaṃ tasya” svabhāvaḥ “syāt” ? |
SA15n1234:1893: sārūpyādalakṣitavivekasya tathā pratibhāsanaṃ syāt yadyasau pūrvvasvabhāve satyevānyato bhavet |
SA15n1234:1899: yo'paraḥ svabhāvaḥ sa kimiti tasya na bhavati ?
SA15n1234:1902: ityata āha- “tathā ca” vastvantaratve sati vināśahetorupajāyamānasya svabhāvasya pūrvvako bhāvaḥ svahetubhyo yaḥ sthitidharmmā jātaḥ so'cyutidharmme sthito nivṛttibhāṅna bhavati,
SA15n1234:1908: na ca pūrvvakasya pracyutidharmmatā ityata āha- “etena” anantaroktena “kaṭhinādīnām” ādiśabdād dravādīnāṃ tāmrasuvarṇṇādināmagniśītavātādibhyo dravatvakaṭhinatvādisvabhāvāntarotpattirvyavasthitarūpasya tāmrādeḥ “pratyuktā” pratyākhyātāḥ,
SA15n1234:1910: kathaṃ tarhi svabhāvāntarotpattiḥ pūrvvasya cāpracyutidharmme sthitasyābhāvo yuktaḥ ?
SA15n1234:1913: sahakāriṇaḥ parasparopasarppaṇādyāśraya pratyayaviśeṣopajātātiśayā “dupādānācca” yat tat kaṭhinādirūpaṃ tāmrādi svarasato nirudhyate |
SA15n1234:1914: tata eva upādānakāraṇādagnyādisahakārikāraṇopādānapratyayopajātaviśeṣād “apara eva” anya eva dravakaṭhinādisvabhāvo dravagrahaṇasyopalakṣaṇatvāt,
SA15n1234:1915: “utpanno” na tu pūrvvakameva kaṭhinadravādirūpaṃ tāmrādi vyavasthitātmakaṃ dravakaṭhinādisvabhāvena pariṇatamiti |
SA15n1234:1916: atra para āha- “kenoktaṃ” yathā ‘sthitidharmmaṇaḥ sato vināśahetorasthitisvabhāvotpattistato vināśaḥ’ iti,
SA15n1234:1918: kintu sa svayaṃ sthitidharmmaiva svahetubhirjanito nāsyāsthirasvabhāvatā vināśahetorupajāyate |
SA15n1234:1919: kathaṃ jñāyate yathā ‘svahetubhiḥ svabhāvena sthitidharmmaiva janitaḥ’ iti ? |
SA15n1234:1921: yadi svabhāvenāsthitidharmmā svahetorjātaḥ syāt tadā tadasambhave'pi nāvatiṣṭheta |
SA15n1234:1922: tasya svabhāvena sthitidharmmaṇaḥ svahetubhirevāyamaparaḥ svabhāvo niyamito yaduta “parasmāt” virodhino'gnyāde “rvvināśaḥ svayaṃ bhavatīti” |
SA15n1234:1923: parasmāditi karmmaṇi lyaplope pañcamī paramapekṣya ityarthaḥ |
SA15n1234:1924: svahetubhirevāyaṃ niyamitasvabhāvo jāto yathā tvayā virodhinamapekṣya svayaṃ nirvva(va)
SA15n1234:1928: nanu yadyasya vināśao virodhisannidhāne svayameva bhavatyahetukaḥ prāpnoti,
SA15n1234:1929: ahetośca deśakālasvabhāvaniyamo na yukta ityata āha- “na ca” naiva vināśo nāma vinaṣṭuraparaḥ svabhāvaḥ,
SA15n1234:1939: nanu ca kālāntarasthitiradharmmatāmupagacchato naiva nityavikalpasyāvakāśaḥ | na |
SA15n1234:1942: tathā hi- yadyayaṃ saṃvatsarasthitidharmmā svahetubhirjanitastadā saṃvatsaraparisamāptau yo'syādāvudayakāle saṃvatsarasthitidharmmā svabhāvo yato'yaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ sthitaḥ sa eva tadante'pi |
SA15n1234:1944: tadante'pi prathamotpannasaṃvatsarasthitidharmmasvabhāvāparityāgādaparāparasaṃvatsarasthitiprasaṅgāt kālāntarasthitidharmmatopagame'pi nityataivopagatā bhavatīti nityavikalpo durnnivāraḥ |
SA15n1234:1945: vināśahetusannidhau svayaṃ nivarttata iti copagamādanityavikalpo naśvarātmatāvikalpaḥ |
SA15n1234:1946: tathā hi- vināśahetvabhimatasannidhau svayaṃ vinaśyato yo'sya svabhāvaḥ sa eva bhāvasyaikarūpatvādutpannamātrasyeti tadaiva vināśaprasaṅgāt kathamasya kālantarasthitidharmmatā sambhavati ? |
SA15n1234:1947: evaṃ vikalpe kṛte pāścātyavikalpopagame kālāntarasthitirevāsya truṭyatīti nityavikalpa evānenopagantavyaḥ |
SA15n1234:1948: tatra vināśahetusannidhau svayaṃ nāśopagame prāṅnityo bhūtvā paścādanityo vinaśvarasvabhāvo bhavatīti brūte |
SA15n1234:1953: yo'sau nityaḥ svabhāvaḥ prāktanaḥ tasya nityābhimatasya svayaṃ paścānnāśaṃ brūvāṇaḥ sarvvadā pratikṣaṇameva nāśaṃ prāha |
SA15n1234:1955: atha pratikṣaṇamasya nāśo na bhavati tadā paścādapi tadayogāt sarvvadaivānāśaṃ prāheti kṛtvā pūrvvasminnityābhimate svabhāve vināśaheturasamartho'kiñcitkara eva |
SA15n1234:1956: nanu ca vināśahetornaiva sāmarthyamupagataṃ parena virodhisannidhimapekṣya svayaṃ nāśopagamāt | na |
SA15n1234:1961: svahetava evātrāparādhyanti yadakiñcitkare'pi tatrāpekṣāyāṃ niyuñjata iti cet |
SA15n1234:1962: kaḥ punarayamasthānābhiniveśaḥ teṣāṃ yat tatra tathā niyuñjate |
SA15n1234:1967: yadapyuktaṃ ‘yathā'nyeṣāṃ kṣaṇikavādināmakiñcitkaramapi mugdarādikamapekṣya ghaṭādipravāho nivarttate tathā'smākamapi kālāntarasthāyī bhāvaḥ’ iti tadapi parasamayānabhijñatayocyate |
SA15n1234:1968: yato nāsmākaṃ pravāho nāma kṣaṇavyatirikto'sti yo'kiñcitkaramugdarādisannidhau nivartteta |
SA15n1234:1972: yā tu teṣāṃ kapālādivṛttilakṣaṇā paryudāsavṛttyā nivṛttiḥ yasyāṃ satyāmekatvābhiniveśino lokasya sadṛśāparabhāvarūpasya vibhramanimittasyāpagamāt ‘nivṛttā ghaṭādayaḥ’ iti vyavahāraḥ,
SA15n1234:1975: vegavanmugdarādisahakāriṇo ghaṭakṣaṇāt parasparopasarppaṇādyāśrayāt pratyayaviśeṣāt sañjātātiśayāt kapāladerbhavanadharmmatvāt tasya ca tajjannasvabhāvatvāditi |
SA15n1234:1976: svabhāvadvayopagamaprasaṅgāditi parijihīrṣayā para āha- “na prāg” ityādi |
SA15n1234:1979: sarvvadaikasvabhāvasya sarvvadā nityataiva na paścādanityasvabhāvatāsambhava iti |
SA15n1234:1980: siddhāntavādyāha- “sa tarhi bhāvaḥ” sarvvadā nityasvabhāvaḥ svabhāvena “nāśamanāviśan” apratipadyamānaḥ kathaṃ naiva naṣṭo(kathaṃ naṣṭo) nāma ? |
SA15n1234:1983: upasaṃharannāha- “yata evaṃ” sthitidharmmaṇāṃ vināśo naiva yujyate tasmāt sati asya vināśe yadyavaśyambhāvī kṛtakarūpasya sato vināśa iṣyate paraistadā “vināśasvabhāvena”- vinaśyati nāvatiṣṭhata iti vināśaḥ |
SA15n1234:1986: “tena” kṛtakarūpeṇa satā vastunā svahetubhyo “bhavitavyam” anyathā'vaśyambhāvitayopagatasya kṛtakātmanāṃ satāṃ vināśasyaivāyogāt |
SA15n1234:1988: āha- “tathāpi” svayaṃ vināśasvabhāvatve'pi na kevalamavinaśvarasvabhāvatve svabhāvānyathātvāsambhavād vyartho vināśaheturiti prathamavikalpopanyāsa evoktam na punarucyate |
SA15n1234:1990: tadevaṃ vināśaṃ pratyanapekṣāmasāmarthya-vaiyarthyābhyāṃ taddhetvayogena kṛtakalakṣaṇasya sattvasya pūrvvācāryadarśitāṃ pratipādya yathā'sau viparyaye bādhakapramāṇatāmanubhavati tada darśayannāha- “tasmād vināśa” ityādi |
SA15n1234:1993: anapekṣaśca kṛtakarūpaḥ san bhāvo vināśe'vaśyambhāvivināśatayopagataḥ parairiti svabhāvahetuprasaṅgaprayogo viparyaye bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ pūrvvācāryapradarśitam |
SA15n1234:1995: nāśasyākādācitkatvādudayānantaraṃ nāśa iti “yaḥ san” kṛtakalakṣaṇo bhāvaḥ “sa vināśī” vinaśvarasvabhāvo naśvaratāyāḥ sādhyadharmmasya nivṛttau ca kṛtakalakṣaṇasattvanivṛttiriti kṛtvā kṛtakalakṣaṇasya sattvasya kṣaṇikatāyāmanvayavyatirekasiddhiḥ sampadyate anapekṣayā'nukrāntasattvakṣaṇikatvayostādātmyasiddheḥ tannibandhanayoranvayavyatirekayorapi niścayāt |
SA15n1234:1996: tadevaṃ pūrvvācāryān prati akṛtakasya sato'bhāvāt “sadakāraṇavannityam” iti nityalakṣaṇavirahādeva na tannityatvam |
SA15n1234:1997: yattu sad utpattimat tad uktena nyāyenāvaśyaṃnāśitayopagataṃ paraiḥ kālāntarasthāyi na bhavatīti prati pāditam |
SA15n1234:1999: yadā tu yat sat tat kṣaṇikameveti sāmānyenocyate kṛtakākṛtakalakṣaṇaṃ sato bhedamanapekṣya prauḍhavāditayā kṛtakasyāpi cāvaśyambhāvī vināśa iti paropagamo nāpekṣyate,
SA15n1234:2000: tadā vināśaṃ pratyanapekṣatvameva sarvvasya na sidhyati |
SA15n1234:2002: dṛṣṭo ghaṭādīnāṃ teṣāmeva taddhaitvayogat tatrānapekṣā yujyate |
SA15n1234:2003: ye tu deśādivyavahitāḥ parvvatādayo vā vinaśāmāviśanto na dṛṣṭāḥ teṣāmavaśyaṃ vināśitvopagamanibandhanābhāvādantye'pyayaṃ vināśaṃ pratyanapekṣa eva vinaśyanna'viśeṣādādāvapi tabhdāvaniyata iti vaktumaśakyatvāt tatsvabhāvasāpekṣatvāt |
SA15n1234:2004: vināśaṃ pratyanapekṣatvāsiddherakṛtakānāṃ cākāśādīnāṃ vināśisvabhāvasāpekṣāṇāmityanapekṣayā sato naśvarasvabhāvatā'siddheḥ anvayavyatirekayostannibandhanayorayogamutpaśyannarthakriyāvirodhalakṣaṇameva tadā bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ tādātmyaprasādhakamabhidhānīyamiti manyamānaḥ pūrvvapakṣamutthāpayannāha- “svabhāvato” naśvaratve'pyuktena nyāyena paridṛśyamānavināśānāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ “kaścid” deśādivyavahitaḥ parvvatādirvvā'nupalabdhavināśaḥ kṛtako'pi sadrūpa ākāśādirvvā'kṛtakaḥ sanna “'tatsvabhāvo'pi” avināśisvabhāvo'pi syāt |
SA15n1234:2007: tataśca vināśisvabhāvasāpekṣatvāt tadanapekṣatvamasiddhamiti tadvaśāt sādhyasya kṣaṇikatvasya sattvasvabhāvatvāsiddheḥ tannibandhanā nānvayavyatirekasiddhiriti |
SA15n1234:2008: kiṃ punaratrāśaṅkānimittaṃ yena kaścidatatsvabhāvo'pyāśaṅkayata ityāha- “na hi sarvvaḥ sarvvasya svabhāvaḥ” iti |
SA15n1234:2009: vicitrasvabhāvā hi bhāvā dṛśyante- kecit sapratighāḥ kecidapratighāḥ,
SA15n1234:2011: tathā kecidvināśinaḥ anye tvavināśisvabhāvāḥ śaṅkayanta iti pūrvvapakṣāśaṅkā |
SA15n1234:2019: evaṃ manyate- iha tāvadidameva vicāraṇīyam kiṃlakṣaṇametad bhāvānāṃ sattvaṃ yuktamiti |
SA15n1234:2023: vandhyāsutādīnāmasattvāt kathaṃ sattāyogaḥ ? iti cet | na |
SA15n1234:2027: yadi ca satāmeva sattāyogaḥ evaṃ tarhyanyat sattvalakṣaṇamabhidhānīyam sattāyogasya ca vaiyarthyam,
SA15n1234:2030: evaṃ sati yadevārthakriyasāmarthyayuktaṃ tasyaiva sattāyoga ityarthakriyāsāmarthyameva bhāvalakṣaṇamāyātamityapārthakaḥ |
SA15n1234:2033: anyathā sāmānyādīnāṃ kathaṃ svarūpaṃ sattvaṃ syāt ? |
SA15n1234:2040: yathā ca dhrauvyaṃ na tathotpādavyayāviti naikaṃ vastu yathoktalakṣaṇaṃ syāt |
SA15n1234:2045: yasya tu na kvacicchaktiḥ sa evaikāntenābhāva ucyate |
SA15n1234:2046: śaktilakṣaṇameva sattvamakṣaṇike syāt tataḥ kṣaṇikātmatā sattvasya na sidhyatīti kuto'nvayavyatirekau ?
SA15n1234:2047: iti cet, āha- “na caivākṣaṇikasya” kvacit kārye'ntaśo jñānalakṣaṇe'pi śaktirasti tat kutastasya tallakṣaṇaṃ sattvamatītāderiva bhaviṣyati ?
SA15n1234:2049: nanu ca śakteratīndriyatvāt kāraṇānāṃ kāryarambhaniyamābhāvācca kathaṃ tadviraho'kṣaṇikasya bhavet yato'sya sarvvaśaktivirahalakṣaṇenāsattvena virodhinā nirākriyamāṇaṃ sattvaṃ kṣaṇikātmatāmevānubhavet yato'nvayavyatirekau syātāmityata āha- “kramayaugapadyābhyām” ityādi |
SA15n1234:2052: tathā hi- kramayaugapadyābhyāṃ kāryakriyā vyāptā prakārāntarābhāvāt |
SA15n1234:2053: tataḥ kāryakriyāśaktivyāpakayostayorakṣaṇikatve virodhāt nirvṛttestavdyāptāyāḥ kāryakriyāśakterapi nivṛttiriti sarvvaśaktivirahalakṣaṇamasattvamakṣaṇikatve vyāpakānupalabdhirākarṣati,
SA15n1234:2055: tato nivṛttaṃ sattvaṃ kṣaṇikeṣvevāvatiṣṭhamānaṃ tadātmatāmanubhavatīti- ‘yat sat tat kṣaṇikameva’ ityanvayavyatirekarūpāyā vyāpteḥ siddhirniścayo bhavati |
SA15n1234:2056: nanu ca prakārāntarābhāvāt kāryamaṅkurādikaṃ bījādinā kramayaugapadyābhyāmeva kriyata ityucyate sa eva tu prakārāntaravirahaḥ kāryātmanaḥ kutaḥ siddhaḥ ? |
SA15n1234:2060: tataḥ prakarāntareṇārthakriyāsambhavāt kramayaugapadyanivṛttāvapi nārthakriyāsāmartthyanivṛttiriti kuto'kṣaṇikatve sati sarvvasāmarthyavirahalakṣaṇamasattvam ?
SA15n1234:2064: tathā hi-kramo nāma paripāṭiḥ kāryāntarāsāhityaṃ kaivalyamaṅkurādeḥ,
SA15n1234:2067: tasya cāṅkurādisvabhāvasyānyasahitasya kevalasya vā'bhāve pratyakṣabodhagamyamāne satyupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpta eva svabhāvaḥ kramayaugapadyabhāvabahirbhūto nopalabhyate |
SA15n1234:2068: vastunaḥ upalabhyasyānyasāhitye kaivalye cāpanīte tadviviktadeśādipratibhāsinaḥ pratyakṣasyodayāt svabhāvānupalambhata evābhāvaniścayādilakṣaṇavyavahāravṛtteḥ |
SA15n1234:2069: tasya cāṅkurādibhāvasyāvasthādvayabahirbhāvaniṣedhe kayościddeśakālayoḥ deśāntarādau krameṇāṅkurādibhāvavatīratarasmin vā bhāve'pi na kācit kṣatiḥ |
SA15n1234:2070: tataḥ pratyakṣata eva prakārāntarābhāvasiddheḥ kathaṃ kramayaugapadyābhyāmarthakriyāśaktiravyāptā syāt ? |
SA15n1234:2071: śāstrakārastu yathā pratyakṣata eva prakārāntarābhāvasiddhiḥ tathā svayam “etena kramākramādayo'pī”ti atidiśan vakṣyati |
SA15n1234:2074: atra prayogaḥ- yatra yatprakāravyavacchedena yaditaraprakāravyavasthānaṃ na tatra prakārāntarasambhavaḥ,
SA15n1234:2076: asti ca kramayaugapadyayoranyataraprakāravyavacchedena taditaraprakāravyavasthānaṃ vyavacchidyamānaprakārāviṣayīkṛte sarvvatra kāryakāraṇarūpe vastunīti viruddhopalabdhiḥ vyavacchidyamānaprakāretaravyavasthānaṃ ca,
SA15n1234:2080: viruddhopalabdhiṣu bahirddharmmiṇi hetoḥ sabhdāvamupadarśya virodhasādhanameva bādhakam,
SA15n1234:2082: tato viruddhayorekatrāsambhāvāt pratiyogyabhāvaniścayaḥ śītoṣṇasparśayoriva bhāvābhāvayoriva veti kuto'navasthā ? |
SA15n1234:2096: nityaśca yadā yugapat karoti tataḥ prāgapi bhāvāt tadaiva tatkriyāprasaṅgaḥ punastato'pi pūrvvataram ityevaṃ na kadācidyugapat kriyā syāt |
SA15n1234:2097: pṛrvvottarakālayoścaikadā yugapatkāriṇo'nyadā sarvvārthakriyāsāmarthyavirahalakṣaṇamasattvaṃ syāditi kathaṃ na kṣaṇikatā ? |
SA15n1234:2100: evamakṣaṇikatve sati cakṣurādyāyatanānāmasattvaprasaṅgāt kṣaṇikatāyāmeva sattvamiti yat sat tat kṣaṇikameveti sato naśvarātmatāsiddheḥ anvayavyatirekarūpavyāptisiddhiriti ||
